name: Hotel Della Torre Argentina
description: Hotel della Torre Argentina is an elegant historic building in the centre of Rome, 2 minutes' walk from the market in Campo de Fiori square. Rooms offer free Wi-Fi, air conditioning, and a flat-screen satellite TV. The hotel features a panoramic terrace with chairs and tables, offering views of Rome's rooftops. The building dates back to the 18th century, and is complete with a lift. The interiors are classically decorated, and rooms come with carpeted or parquet floors. A sweet and savoury buffet is served daily in the breakfast room, which features brick walls, arches, and vaulted ceilings. Della Torre Argentina Hotel is right in front a bus stop providing direct links to Roma Termini Train Station.

name: Mama House Roma
address: 40 Via Goffredo Mameli Primo piano, interno 3, scala C, 00153 Rome
description: In the heart of Rome, Mama House Roma features inner courtyard views from the balcony. The air-conditioned accommodation is 500 metres from Piazza di Santa Maria in Trastevere. The bed and breakfast is fitted with a satellite flat-screen TV. The bed and breakfast offers a terrace. Popular points of interest near Mama House Roma include Campo de' Fiori, Largo di Torre Argentina and Palazzo Venezia. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 16 km from the accommodation.

All rooms have a classic style, views of the city, and a work desk. Some rooms have a private bathroom, others have a shared one. Some rooms have a private balcony. Roma San Pietro Train Station is just 150 metres from the property, while the Pantheon is 2 km away.

name: CC Palace Hotel
description: This smoke-free inn features a rooftop terrace, concierge services, and a 24-hour front desk. WiFi in public areas is free. Additionally, tour/ticket assistance, multilingual staff, and a porter/bellhop are onsite. Change of towels is available on request.Expedia

name: Hotel Nova Domus Aurelia
description: Located in Rome, 1.8 km from St. Peter's Basilica, Hotel Nova Domus Aurelia provides accommodation with a garden, private parking, a shared lounge and a bar. With free WiFi, this 3-star hotel offers a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service. The property is non-smoking and is situated 1.3 km from Vatican Museums. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms at Hotel Nova Domus Aurelia include air conditioning and a wardrobe. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Hotel Nova Domus Aurelia include Ottaviano Metro Station, St Peter's Square and The Vatican. The nearest airport is Fiumicino Airport, 25 km from the hotel.

name: Palazzo Velabro
description: Attractively situated in Rome, Palazzo Velabro features air-conditioned rooms, a fitness centre, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Boasting room service, this property also has a restaurant and a terrace. Guests can make use of a bar. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Rooms include a private bathroom fitted with a bidet and free toiletries, while certain rooms have a kitchen equipped with a fridge. The rooms have a safety deposit box. A continental, Full English/Irish or Italian breakfast is available each morning at the property. Guests at Palazzo Velabro will be able to enjoy activities in and around Rome, like cycling. Languages spoken at the reception include German, English, Spanish and French. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Roman Forum, Palazzo Venezia and Piazza Venezia. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 14 km from Palazzo Velabro.

name: Profumo Maison Pellegrino
description: Profumo Maison Pellegrino is set in the Navona district in Rome, 400 metres from Castel Sant'Angelo. Rooms are equipped with a flat-screen TV. You will find a kettle in the room. The rooms have a private bathroom. Piazza Navona is 700 metres from Profumo Maison Pellegrino, while Campo de' Fiori is 700 metres away. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 15 km fromMaison Profumo Pellegrino.

description: Featuring 2-star accommodation, Cloud 9 Hotel is located in Rome, 600 metres from Ottaviano Metro Station and 1 km from Vatican Museums. The property is close to several well-known attractions, 1.7 km from Piazza Navona, 1.4 km from Piazza del Popolo and 1.3 km from St. Peter's Basilica. The property is 1.1 km from Castel Sant'Angelo, and within 1.9 km of the city centre. At the hotel, each room is fitted with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Guest rooms at Cloud 9 Hotel include air conditioning and a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Lepanto Metro Station, St Peter's Square and The Vatican. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 17 km from Cloud 9 Hotel.

description: Situated in Rome, in a building dating from 2017, BDB Rooms Navona features a terrace and guestrooms with free WiFi. The property is within 700 metres of Piazza Navona and less than 1 km of Castel Sant'Angelo. Local points of interest like Torre Argentina and Via Condotti are reachable within a 13-minute walk and 1.3 km, respectively. All rooms in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom with free toiletries, while selected rooms also feature a balcony. All units at BDB Rooms Navona include air conditioning and a desk. Pantheon is 1.3 km from the accommodation, while Palazzo Venezia is 1.6 km away. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 17 km from the property.

name: Baboon Room
description: Baboon Room is situated in Rome, a few steps from Via Margutta and 300 metres from Piazza del Popolo. The property is around 400 metres from Via Condotti and 400 metres from Piazza di Spagna. Attractions in the area include Spanish Steps, 400 metres away, or Villa Borghese, located 700 metres from the property. breakfast is served each morning at the property. Trevi Fountain is less than 1 km from the guest house, while Piazza Barberini is an 11-minute walk from the property. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 15 km from the property.

name: Bdb Luxury Rooms Trastevere Torre
description: Situated in the typical district of Trastevere in Rome, BDB Luxury Rooms Trastevere 1st has rooms with air conditioning, free WiFi and a satellite flat-screen TV. Campo de' Fiori is a 10-minute walk away. Each room here will provide you with parquet floors. Featuring a shower, private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer, bathrobes and slippers. The Pantheon is 1.3 km from BDB Luxury Rooms.

name: The First Musica
description: Situated in Rome and with Piazza Navona reachable within 1.1 km, The First Musica features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a terrace, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and luggage storage space. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The rooms at the hotel come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The First Musica provides some rooms with city views, and rooms have a coffee machine. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Italian and American options. At The First Musica you will find a restaurant serving Italian, Pizza and Grill Bbq cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and gluten-free options can also be requested. Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Castel Sant'Angelo, Lepanto Metro Station and Piazza del Popolo. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 16 km from The First Musica, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Ibis Styles Roma Aurelia
description: The ibis Styles Roma Aurelia is new: inaugurated in April 2022, it offers solutions for all types of travelers. Our hotel is located a few steps from the Via Aurelia, a few kilometers from the major attractions of Rome and 20 minutes from Fiumicino Airport. Enjoy the spacious lobby. An open and dynamic space, designed both for work, with comfortable tables and chairs, and for fun and relaxation.accorhotels.com

name: The Pantheon Iconic Rome Hotel, Autograph Collection
description: Discover modern luxury at The Pantheon Iconic Rome Hotel, Autograph Collection. We're just moments from some of Italy's most legendary destinations, like the Pantheon, Piazza Navona, Campo de’ Fiori, the Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain. Within our boutique hotel, you'll find artwork and modern design reminiscent of Rome's golden age, from our lobby to our modern rooms and suites. Unwind amidst bespoke amenities in your boutique hotel room, each with a private wine cellar, a pillow menu and more. The elegant, inviting atmosphere of our boutique hotel is carried into our sixth-floor terrace restaurant and lounge, where delectable fare and craft cocktails are complemented by stunning views of the Roman cityscape. Our Michelin Starred, Idylio by Apreda, offers a modern blend of Mediterranean and Oriental flavors from renowned Chef Francesco Apreda. No matter your reason for visiting Italy, The Pantheon Iconic Rome Hotel Autograph Collection sets the stage for a 5-star experience.Marriott

name: Grand Hotel Fleming
description: Discover a quieter, residential part of Rome at Grand Hotel Fleming by OMNIA hotels. Located 10 minutes' drive from the Auditorium, Olympic Stadium and Foro Italico, it offers good transport links to city centre. Grand Hotel Fleming by OMNIA hotels is conveniently close to Rome's GRA ring road and the motorway, making travelling around the area easy. Buses pass by nearby to take you to the Vatican, 15 minutes' drive away, from where you can catch the Metro across the city. Comfortable, affordable rooms at the Fleming come with satellite television and minibar, and many have their own balcony. Enjoy a few drinks at the bar or go to Grand Hotel Fleming by OMNIA hotels's restaurant for Italian and international meals at dinner.

name: Hotel Amalfi
description: Overlooking Rome's Santa Maria Maggiore Basilica, Hotel Amalfi offers air-conditioned rooms, an extensive buffet breakfast, and free WiFi throughout. Termini Station is 600 metres away. Rooms at the historical Amalfi Hotel include frescoed ceilings, a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The private bathroom has a hairdryer. The sweet and savoury breakfast includes scrambled eggs, bacon, sausages, fresh pastries, and hot drinks. The helpful staff at the hotel Amalfi’s 24-hour reception can offer advice on excursions. The Coliseum is a 15-minute walk away. Cavour and Vittorio Emanuele Metro stops are both within 500 metres of the property.

name: The Liberty Boutique Hotel
description: Offering free WiFi, the Liberty Boutique Hotel features accommodation in Rome. Around 700 metres from Sapienza University of Rome, the property is also 900 metres away from Santa Maria Maggiore. The rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a coffee machine and free toiletries. Rooms include a private bathroom with a shower. Guests at the hotel can enjoy a continental buffet breakfast. Piazza Bologna is 2 km from The Liberty Boutique Hotel, while Piazza Barberini is a 20-minute walk away. Rome Ciampino Airport is 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Popolo & Flaminio Rooms
description: No description found

name: Hotel Sonya
description: Hotel Sonya is in a quiet area of central Rome, in front of the Opera House and 50 metres from the Viminale Palace. This hotel features free WiFi throughout and rooms with cable TV. Rooms at the Sonya Hotel are air conditioned, and have a private bathroom and a tea/coffee maker. For breakfast of all types like American, continental, vegetarian, vegan or classic Italian, our reception will be happy to provide you with a constantly updated selection of the best restaurants nearby. The Sonya is a 2-minute walk from Termini Train Station. Free maps of the city are available at the reception with ticket-booking service.

name: Martis Palace Hotel
description: Located in the Navona district in the heart of Rome, 50 metres from Piazza Navona, Hotel Martis Palace features a terrace. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. All soundproofed rooms come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathrooms are equipped with a large shower. For your comfort, you will find bath robes and slippers. You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Martis Palace offers several common spaces where guests can relax: a library, a bar and a restaurant where breakfast is also served. The property also boasts a large roof terrace overlooking the whole city. Guests benefit from a discount at a spa under the same ownership and set only 100 metres from the property. Campo de' Fiori is 200 metres from Hotel Martis Palace, while Pantheon is 300 metres away. Rome Ciampino Airport is 15 km from the property.

name: Palazzo Navona Hotel
description: Just 100 metres from Piazza Navona square, the 4-star Palazzo Navona Hotel is set in the heart of Rome. It offers free WiFi throughout, a terrace, and air-conditioned rooms with modern décor. These rooms feature a minibar, electric kettle, and flat-screen TV with pay-per-view channels. Each has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, slippers and free toiletries. Palazzo Navona is 300 metres from the Pantheon. Castel Sant'Angelo castle is less than a 15-minute walk away.

name: Comics Guesthouse
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a high-definition TV, as well as a coffee/tea maker and climate control. Other amenities include laundry facilities, towels, a DVD player, and an ironing board.Expedia

name: Magenta Collection Sant'Anna
description: Located just behind Campo de' Fiori in the heart of Rome, Magenta Collection Sant'Anna offers modern, soundproofed accommodation with air conditioning and free WiFi. It is 60 metres from the tram and bus stops in Largo Argentina. Magenta Collection Sant'Anna offers modern and elegant rooms with a flat-screen TV, minibar and safe. They also have a private bathroom with a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. You will be a 5-minute walk from Piazza Navona and some of Rome's most historic monuments, including the Pantheon which is 650 metres away. You are surrounded by restaurants and bars and are a short walk from the characteristic neighbourhood of Trastevere.

name: Residenza Scipioni Luxury Rooms

name: Nobilcasa Suites
description: Centrally located in Rome Nobilcasa Suites is a 2-minute walk from Lepanto Metro Station and 700 metres from the Vatican City. It offers air-conditioned rooms featuring free WiFi. Each elegant room at Nobilcasa Suites will provide you with a flat-screen TV, a mini fridge and a kettle with tea/coffee ingredients. The private bathroom is complete with toiletries and a hairdryer. A sweet and savoury breakfast is served directly in your room. St. Peter's Square is reachable on foot in 10 minutes. Termini Train Station is 6 metro stop from the property.

name: Eitch Belsiana Relais
description: Conveniently situated in the Spagna district of Rome, Eitch Belsiana Relais is located 600 metres from Trevi Fountain, less than 1 km from Barberini Metro Station and a 10-minute walk from Piazza Barberini. This 4-star hotel offers a concierge service, luggage storage space and free WiFi. The property is 600 metres from Spanish Steps, and within 700 metres of the city centre. At the hotel each room comes with a private bathroom. Breakfast is available daily, and includes à la carte, continental and Italian options. Popular points of interest near Eitch Belsiana Relais include Quirinal Hill, Spagna Metro Station and Via Condotti. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Mood44
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a soaking tub and a rainfall showerhead, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, a Select Comfort bed, down comforters, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Hotel Monte Cenci
description: A 10-minute walk from both the Pantheon and Piazza Navona in the centre of Rome, Hotel Monte Cenci boasts a rooftop terrace, bar and stylish rooms with air conditioning and parquet floors. WiFi is free throughout. The spacious rooms come with an elegant décor, a satellite flat-screen TV and a minibar. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. An extensive sweet and savoury buffet breakfast is prepared daily, served on the terrace in fine weather, and gluten-free options are also available. It includes eggs, omelettes, pastries, cheese and cold cuts. Campo de' Fiori is 500 metres from Hotel Monte Cenci, while the lively area of Trastevere is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Ateneo Garden Palace
description: Situated under a 20-minute walk from Termini Metro Station, Ateneo Garden Palace Hotel provides guests with an ideal base when visiting Rome. It provides stylish rooms with private balconies overlooking the courtyard. There are a variety of amenities available to those staying at the hotel, including an express check-in and check-out feature, an executive floor and 24-hour room service. Facilities include an around the clock reception, a concierge and meeting rooms. The rooms at Ateneo Garden Palace Hotel have a shared terrace, a mini bar and a hydro-massage bathtub. They all come with an en suite bathroom which includes a rain shower. Those staying at Ateneo Garden Palace Hotel can sit down to a unique dining experience at the in-house restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close by at mealtime. Each evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. A buffet breakfast is served daily. The hotel is conveniently set in the Latium Wine Region, making it easy for guests to experience the region's specialities. It is within a 20-minute stroll of Roma Termini Railway Station, which allows easy access in and around Rome.Revato

name: Starhotels Michelangelo
address: Via Della Stazione Di San Pietro 14, 00165 Rome
description: Situated a short stroll from Ottaviano - San Pietro - Musei Vaticani Metro Station, Starhotels Michelangelo Rome provides guests with an ideal base when visiting Rome. This peaceful hotel is an ideal choice for exploring local vineyards as it is located in the Latium Wine Region. Starhotels Michelangelo Rome has recently been refurbished and offers free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and 24-hour room service. Airport transfers, a laundry service and a dry cleaning service are available upon enquiry. After a day of discovering the nearby area, guests can unwind in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. They feature an in-room safe, a mini bar and a telephone. The on-site restaurant serves Italian, local and international dishes in a sophisticated setting. Each evening, guests are welcome to enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. Starhotels Michelangelo Rome is close to Vatican Railway Station, making it easy for guests to explore Rome and its surrounding areas. The hotel is also close to the area's popular nightlife destinations, and Institute for the Works of Religion, Via della Conciliazione and the Vatican Museums are a 20-minute stroll away.Revato

name: Trevi 41 Hotel
description: Set on one of Rome's cobbled streets, Trevi 41 Hotel is just 130 metres from the Trevi Fountain. This hotel offers free WiFi throughout, and luxury rooms with air conditioning. Rooms here have either a classic-style or modern design, and include a 32" LCD TV. Each one has a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Some rooms are set in an annex, a 2-minute walk from the hotel's reception. An à la carte, sweet and savoury breakfast is available. Reception is open 24-hours a day and staff can share local knowledge and tourist information. Trevi 41 is set in a 19th-century building surrounded by shops, restaurants and ice cream parlours. Barberini Metro Station is 5 minutes' away on foot, with the designer shops around the Spanish Steps just 500 metres away.

name: Hotel San Giovanni Roma
description: Featuring a bar, Hotel San Giovanni Roma is located in Rome in the Lazio region, 1 km from San Giovanni Metro Station and 1.4 km from Ponte Lungo Metro Station. With a shared lounge, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking is available on site. At the hotel, each room comes with a desk. Guest rooms at Hotel San Giovanni Roma are equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a safety deposit box. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an Italian breakfast. Speaking English and French at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. Domus Aurea is 1.8 km from Hotel San Giovanni Roma, while Vittorio Emanuele Metro Station is 2.7 km away. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 12 km from the hotel.

name: Rome Life Hotel
description: Conveniently situated, Rome Life Hotel offers easy access to Rome's popular hot spots. This modern hotel is an ideal choice for exploring the local vineyards as it is located in the Latium Wine Region. There are a variety of facilities on offer to guests of Rome Life Hotel, such as babysitting/child services, free Wi-Fi and a 24-hour reception. In addition, the multilingual staff are available to offer assistance. Just moments from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily discover the best of the local nightlife. For guests' comfort, all rooms at Rome Life Hotel are both soundproofed and air conditioned. They provide tea and coffee making facilities, a private bathroom and a flat-screen TV. Those staying at the hotel can enjoy a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, ideally based for those who want to stay nearby at mealtime. Each evening, guests are welcome to enjoy a drink in the cosy lounge bar. The hotel also offers a daily breakfast that can be enjoyed in the breakfast room, or there is a range of well-known eateries in the area to discover. Rome Life Hotel is within walking distance of Trevi Fountain, Colosseum and Roman Forum. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to book and organise activities in Rome.Revato

name: Singer Palace Hotel
description: Boasting a rooftop restaurant, Singer Palace Hotel is located right on the famous Via del Corso shopping Street. Set 350 metres from Trevi Fountain, the property offers air-conditioned rooms. Featuring an elegant décor, all rooms have satellite flat-screen TV, while some rooms come with a seating area. The private bathroom is equipped with bathrobe, slippers and free toiletries. À la carte homemade breakfast is available daily with fresh products. Guests can also enjoy Italian cuisine and seafood dishes for lunch and dinner. Pantheon is a 5-minute walk from the property, while Piazza Venezia is 300 metres away. Rome Ciampino airport is 40 minutes' drive from the Singer Palace Hotel.

name: Aparthotel Colombo Roma
description: Set in Garbatella, Aparthotel Colombo Roma offers studios and suites with Sky TV and free fibre-optic WiFi access. Public buses for the city centre stop nearby. The accommodation is soundproofed and air conditioned. The residence also offers on-site laundry facilities. A bus stop 200 metres away has services to Piazza Venezia and Piazza Navona. Garbatella Metro and the Eataly food hall are both 15 minutes’ walk from the property.

name: Serena Hotel
description: Hotel Serena is set within walking distance of Termini Railway Station, which is just around the corner. The area offers many typical restaurants. The friendly staff of Hotel Serena can provide information about Rome, city tours, or private shuttles to various landmarks (at extra costs). Each room of the Serena reflects the elegance and style of the hotel. A continental buffet breakfast is served daily in the bar (07:30 - 10:00). Coliseum is a 15-minute walk from Hotel Serena.

name: Hotel Colosseum
description: Hotel Colosseum is set in a quiet street in the city centre. The roof terrace offers unforgettable views of ancient Rome. The Coliseum and the Santa Maria Maggiore Basilica are just a short walk away. All rooms at the Colosseum Hotel are air-conditioned, and come with a satellite TV and elegant parquet floors. The private bathrooms are complete with bath or shower, hairdryer, and toiletries. Breakfast is a varied buffet.

name: The First Roma Arte
description: This 5-star boutique hotel is in Rome's historic centre an 8-minute walk from the Spanish Steps. It offers a panoramic rooftop terrace, 24-hour personal assistance and room service and elegant rooms with free WiFi. The First Roma is a member of LVX Collection of Preferred Hotels & Resorts. It is a 2-minute walk from Richard Meyer Ara Pacis Museum, a 5-minute walk from Flaminio Metro Station and 750 metres from the Spanish Steps. Exclusive boutique shops on Via Condotti are 550 metres from the property. Rooms at The First Roma feature contemporary works of art and modern furniture. Each comes with iPod docks, soft bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. Some suites boast a terrace with hot tub. Guests can enjoy seafood at the Michelin-starred Acquolina restaurant as well as the rooftop Acquaroof restaurant. A lobby bar and a free fitness area are also available on site.

name: Domus Livia
description: No description found

name: Harry's Bar Trevi Hotel & Restaurant
description: Just metres from Rome's Trevi Fountain, Harry's Bar Trevi Hotel & Restaurant offers modern rooms and a restaurant. WiFi is free throughout. All air conditioned, rooms here come with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, parquet floors, and a minibar. Some rooms include a seating area. The private bathroom has bathrobes, a hairdryer, and free toiletries. Barberini Metro is 550 metres form the property, while the Quirinale is 5 minutes' walk away. Rome Ciampino Airport is 20 km from Harry's Bar Trevi Hotel & restaurant. The museum, La città dell'Acqua - Vicus Caprarius is 50 metres from the property.

name: The One Boutique Hotel & Spa Rome
description: A 3-minute walk from Piazza Barberini and 300 metres from the Trevi Fountain, THE ONE Boutique Hotel Cocktail bar & SPA Roma offers modern-style rooms with design furniture in the heart of Rome. WiFi throughout is included. At this adults-only hotel, rooms feature a Smart TV, a Nespresso® coffee machine and air conditioning. Some rooms come with city views, while all rooms have a suspended bed and a fully equipped private bathroom. An American breakfast is available daily. Aperitifs, cocktails and snacks are available at the b-cool | bakery & bar. The Spanish Steps and Barberini Metro Station are both 5-minute walk from the hotel. Rome's Fiumicino International Airport is a 35-minute drive away.

name: Best Western Hotel Artdeco
description: Special Protection, our commitment to ensuring a safe stay with strict cleaning and sanitization protocols. Technologies to support the interaction with the staff to promote social distancing. Protective equipment and safety procedures for staff and guests. The Best Western Hotel Artdeco is located in the city center, between Via Veneto and the train station. The hotel is connected to the air terminal via the Catro Pretorio subway stop. Some of the amenities enjoyed by guests include deco furnishings and a restaurant serving international and regional cuisine. Enjoy your stay. This property has joined the Stay for the Planet project. It undertakes to manage the hotel activities in a sustainable manner by monitoring consumptions, reducing the presence of disposable plastic, taking energy efficiency actions for a positive impact on the environment. **Restaurant temporarily closed**bestwestern.com

name: Corso 281 Luxury Suites
description: Corso 281 Luxury Suites offers modern accommodation located in Roma, 200 metres from Piazza Venezia. Free Wi-Fi access is available in all areas. Each air-conditioned suite will provide you with a flat-screen TV, a Nespresso machine and a minibar. Featuring free Bulgari toiletries, the private bathroom also comes with a hairdryer and bathrobes. Some studios feature an equipped kitchenette and a furnished balcony. Breakfast features a sweet or a savoury option and it is served directly in your room. The Coliseum is a 15-minute walk from Corso 281 Luxury Suites. Trevi Fountain is 550 metres away.

name: Hotel Locarno
description: Hôtel Locarno, housed in early 20th-century twin buildings, is well located on a charming little street just off of Piazza del Popolo, features a rooftop terrace overlooking Rome's historic centre. Offering free bikes and free Wi-Fi, this property has rooms with an Art Nouveau style. Guest rooms interiors were carefully restored and reimagined in a retro-classic style, combining Art Deco furniture and fixtures with a dash of urban hipness. Hôtel Locarno has an unbreakable bond with the world of art and culture. In fine weather, a generous continental breakfast is served al fresco on the furnished patio. In the afternoon and evening you can also enjoy a drink at the Locarno's bar, also open to the public. Intimate private salons and rooftop terraces offer venues for a variety of events from meetings and business lunches to cocktail receptions and gala dinners. All air conditioned, en suite rooms at the Locarno Hotel come with fine fabrics, a TV, safe and minibar. A 4-minute walk away, Flaminio Metro Station offers direct connections to the Vatican City area and Termini Train Station. The Spanish Steps are 850 metres from the Locarno.

name: Hotel Morgana
description: Just 200 metres from Termini Railway Station, Hotel Morgana offers rooms with a mix of antique furniture and modern facilities and free WiFi throughout. The Colosseum is 2 metro stops away. The surrounding area boasts great public transport links around Rome and its international airports, Fiumicino and Ciampino. A generous sweet and savoury buffet breakfast is served every morning in the hotel’s dining room. The public spaces are decorated with warm colours and classic wood furniture. Guests have free access to a small gym located right in front of Morgana Hotel. The rooms include a flat-screen TV with satellite and Sky channels, and a mini fridge. Some feature modern decoration, while others have a more classic feel.

name: Bio Hotel Raphaël
description: One street from Piazza Navona, Hotel Raphael offers luxurious rooms with marble bathroom and parquet floors. Its roof terrace boasts panoramic views of Rome, from St. Peter's to the Pantheon. All air-conditioned rooms come with flat-screen satellite TV and free wired internet. Each elegant bathroom features a bathrobe, slippers, and courtesy set by Bulgari. Some rooms were designed by architect Richard Meier and include an entertainment system by Bose. The 5-star Bio Hotel Raphael - Relais & Châteaux serves an abundant continental breakfast every morning. Guests can also dine at the Mater Terrae restaurant. The Raphael Hotel is well connected by buses and most of Rome's historic attractions are just a short walk away. You can reach the Pantheon in 5 minutes on foot, while Castel Sant'Angelo is only 700 metres away.

name: The First Roma Dolce
description: Situated in Rome and with Piazza del Popolo reachable within 400 metres, The First Dolce - Preferred Hotels & Resorts features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a restaurant, free WiFi throughout the property and a bar. This 5-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a minibar, a coffee machine, a bidet, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a shower and a hairdryer, some rooms at the hotel also boast a city view. An American breakfast is available each morning at The First Dolce - Preferred Hotels & Resorts. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Villa Borghese, Trevi Fountain and Spagna Metro Station. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 18 km from The First Dolce - Preferred Hotels & Resorts.

name: Albergo Ottocento
description: Located just 200 metres from Barberini Metro Station, Albergo Ottocento is a 5-minute walk from the Trevi Fountain. The elegant rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The Ottocento's continental breakfast buffet includes fresh pastries. The bar serves international cocktails, and dinner is available on the terrace during summer. Free Wi-Fi is offered throughout the Ottocento Hotel. Guests can also benefit from discounted rates at the nearby Rossini restaurant.

name: Hotel Forum
description: This 4-star Hotel is set in an 18th-century building opposite the Roman Forum, between the Coliseum and Piazza Venezia. The restaurant serves Roman and international specialities, and its terrace offers unique views of the Eternal City. Rooms at Hotel Forum have an elegant design with luxurious fabrics and furnishings, parquet floors, and comfortable beds. All air-conditioned, they also feature a satellite TV, a minibar, and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi is available. The lobby features Persian rugs and wainscot panelling. The bar serves international cocktails. A generous breakfast is available each morning on the rooftop terrace with panoramic views of the city. The Forum Hotel is next to the Church of Santi Quirico e Giulitta, and 500 metres from Colosseo Metro Station on line B.

name: Sentho Roma
description: Sentho Roma features a garden, shared lounge, a terrace and restaurant in Rome. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around 400 metres from Santa Maria Maggiore, 500 metres from Cavour Metro Station and less than 1 km from Colosseo Metro Station. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Every room has a kettle, while certain rooms here will provide you with a balcony and others also provide guests with city views. All units include a wardrobe. A continental, Italian or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Popular points of interest near Sentho Roma include Quirinal Hill, Domus Aurea and Rome Termini Metro Station. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 14 km from the accommodation.

name: Charme Spagna Boutique Hotel
description: The Charme Spagna Boutique Hotel is located on the first and third floor of a building and on the second floor of an annex dependace in the historic center of Rome 350 meters from the Spanish Steps. Charme Spagna Boutique Hotel boasts 2 terraces it features elegant accommodation with free WiFi. Air-conditioned rooms at the Charme Spagna Boutique Hotel are fully equipped and feature a satellite flat-screen TV with Sky channels, minibar, coffee machine and safe. The private bathroom includes a shower, hairdryer and free toiletries. A rich sweet and savoury buffet breakfast is served daily, and can be enjoyed daily on the terrace in fine weather. The popular shopping street of Via del Corso is 200 metres away, while the Trevi Fountain and the Pantheon are both less than a 10-minute walk away. Spagna Metro Station, with links to the Vatican and Termini Train Station, is 500 metres away.

name: NH Collection Roma Giustiniano
description: NH Collection Roma Giustiniano is a hidden oasis in the heart of bustling Rome. Situated right beside the River Tiber and close to all that the city has to offer including St Peter's Basilica, Sant'Angelo Bridge, Sant'Angelo Castle and the Trastevere neighborhood. Luxurious designer boutiques and fine dining are only steps away. Marvel at the wonders of Vatican City which is found within walking distance. If you are driving, there is an on-site garage. NH Collection Roma Giustiniano has 161 rooms, all finished in a modern, minimalist style and featuring hardwood floors. Some of the rooms look out over the historic landmarks of Rome. Enjoy a fragrant Italian espresso with a Lavazza machine in each room. For relaxation, we have a pillow menu, rain-effect shower and soundproofing, and to stay connected there is free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel. For breakfast, you will be delighted with local dishes and a variety of cold and hot plates, including gluten-free options and children’s breakfast. Lunch and dinner are served at Zenzero & Cannella, and for a relaxing drink head to the stylish bar. 8 meeting rooms are available at the hotel.NH Hoteles

name: Hotel San Valentino
description: Situated in Rome's elegant Prati district, Hotel San Valentino is a 2-minute walk from Lepanto Metro, on the same line as the Spanish Steps and Rome Termini Station. This hotel is only 300 metres from Via Cola di Rienzo shopping street. Rooms offer a Smart TV, a safe and a private bathroom with shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. The San Valentino is a 10-minute walk from Castel Sant’Angelo, and less than 1.5 km from Saint Peter’s Square. Piazza Cavour is a 10-minute walk away.

name: La Grande Bellezza Guest House Rome
description: No description found

name: Hotel Gregoriana
description: Just a 2-minute walk from the Spanish Steps, Hotel Gregoriana offers modern accommodation in the Spagna district of Rome. The property is 500 metres from the Trevi Fountain and the Barberini Palace. The air-conditioned rooms come with free Wi-Fi, a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is served daily in the dining room. Hotel Gregoriana is 300 metres from Spagna Metro stop which takes you to St. Peter’s Square and Roma Termini Train Station.

name: Hotel The Brand
description: The Brand is a modern building set in a green, peaceful suburb of Rome, close to the A90 motorway access. The hotel offers free parking but the garage is subject to charges 10 euro per day. A public bus, running every 30 minutes, takes you to the Baldo Degli Ubaldi Metro Station (line A). The Brand has a reading room, TV lounge, and large, private gardens. Rooms at The Brand are bright and come with air conditioning.

name: Hotel Gioberti
description: Hotel Gioberti is located on the namesake main road, 100 metres from Termini Railway Station and 300 metres from the Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore. Enjoy comfortable rooms and a rich breakfast. The Hotel Gioberti is located in a restored 19th-Century building and is conveniently linked to the main tourist, shopping and business areas. Walk to the Termini Metro Station and bus stop, and the whole city and surroundings will be yours. All rooms at Hotel Gioberti are spacious, soundproofed, and elegantly furnished. The buffet breakfast includes a selection of sweet and savoury food, cereals, yoghurt, and hot and cold drinks. Special requests, including gluten-free products, can also be arranged. Staff are available 24/7 to assist guests with anything they need during their stay.

name: Hotel Cortina
description: The 3-star Cortina Hotel offers comfort and convenience whether you're on business or holiday in Rome. Both business travelers and tourists can enjoy the hotel's facilities and services. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Cortina Hotel. All rooms are designed and decorated to make guests feel right at home, and some rooms come with television LCD/plasma screen, air conditioning, heating, desk, mini bar. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. For reliable service and professional staff, Cortina Hotel caters to your needs.Agoda

name: Hotel Fellini
description: Set 300 metres from the Trevi Fountain, Hotel Fellini offers free high-speed WiFi throughout and air-conditioned rooms. The Spanish Steps are 550 metres away. This hotel offers a sweet and savoury continental breakfast. This morning treat is served at the property’s breakfast room, located in the same building, with a separate entrance. Barberini Metro is 250 metres from the property.

name: La Residenza Dell'Angelo
description: Just 100 metres from River Tiber and Castel Sant’Angelo palace, La Residenza Dell’Angelo offers a central location in Rome. Its modern rooms come with free Wi-Fi and an LCD TV. Decorated with elegant wood floors, light-coloured walls and dark furniture, each room is soundproofed and air conditioned. Facilities also include a fridge and a private bathroom complete with bathrobes. Every morning you will receive a voucher for breakfast at a snack bar next door if included in your reservation. Staff can recommend many local restaurants nearby. St Peter’s Basilica can be reached on foot in 10 minutes. Rome’s main shopping street, Via Del Corso, is a 15-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Degli Artisti
description: Hotel Degli Artisti offers free WiFi throughout and luxuriously furnished rooms in the heart of Rome. This hotel set in a historical building along a quiet yet central street and also features a bar. All rooms are air conditioned and soundproofed, and have a private bathroom with toiletries, slippers and a hairdryer. Each room combines modern amenities such as a minibar and a flat-screen satellite TV with classic-style touches and parquet floors. A sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is prepared daily including cold cuts, cheese, eggs, and sausages. The on-site bar is available for drinks and light meals from 16:00 until 23:00. There is a 24-hour front desk at the property. Hotel Degli Artisti is a 5-minute walk from the Trevi Fountain, while the Spanish Steps are 300 metres away.

name: Roema Guest House
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and climate control. Other amenities include down comforters, towels, kitchenware and utensils, and housekeeping.Expedia

name: Casa Mia Vaticano Guest House
description: Casa Mia Vaticano Guest House is set in Rome along Via Gregorio VII, a 20-minute walk from the Vatican City and 1 km from Rome's San Pietro Train Station. This property offers free WiFi, rooms with classic-style décor and a shared lounge with tea/coffee making facilities. Each room at this guest house is air conditioned and comes with a flat-screen satellite TV. Each room is fitted with a private bathroom with a shower. An Italian breakfast of croissants and cappuccino is provided daily, and can be enjoyed in the breakfast room or in the comfort of your room. Casa Mia Vaticano Guest House is a 25-minute walk from the banks of the Tiber river. Rome Ciampino Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Exe International Palace
description: Set in a beautiful 19th-century building, Exe International Palace is a hotel with free WiFi set across the road from Rome's Opera Theatre. Its elegant rooms feature air conditioning and satellite TV. Exe International Palace is 400 metres from Repubblica Metro Station, and a 10-minute walk from Termini Train Station. The Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain are also within walking distance. The hotel's International Cafè restaurant serves typical local products combined with intense fragrances and aromas. Breakfast is an American buffet. The bar is open till late at night and offers tasty snacks and excellent cocktails prepared by the skilled barman.

name: Hotel Royal Bissolati
description: Set 300 metres from Barberini Metro Station, Royal Bissolati is located in Rome. The hotel offers air-conditioned rooms and an on-site bar. WiFi is free throughout. All units feature a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a walk-in shower, toiletries and a hairdryer. A continental buffet-style breakfast is available every morning. The Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain are both 1 km away. Villa borghese is a 15-minute walk from the property. Rome Ciampino Airport is 16 km from Royal Bissolati.

name: Bettoja Hotel Atlantico
description: The Hotel Atlantico a 1935 building is built on the highest of romes seven hills the Esquilino. Thanks to its central position it allows you to quickly reach the main points of interest and many touristic sites like the Colosseum, Imperial Forum, Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain. The direct train to the airport is only a short walk from the hotel also making the hotel ideal for those who come to Rome by train or by air.iHotelier/iStay

name: The Spanish Suite Via di Ripetta
description: No description found

name: Hotel Santa Costanza
description: Hotel Santa Costanza by OMNIA hotels is located in north-eastern Rome, a 10-minute walk from Bologna Metro Station. It enjoys good bus links with Termini Station and has free Wi-Fi. Rooms are simply decorated and feature either wood or light-coloured furniture, artwork and mostly wood floors. Facilities include air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a complete private bathroom. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can recommend sights in the surrounding and organise city tours. The Santa Costanza is next to a bus stop, providing quick links with Rome Termini Station in 10 minutes.

name: Damaso Hotel
description: Centrally set in Rome, Hotel Damaso is 150 metres from Piazza Navona and a 2-minute walk from Campo de' Fiori. It features a panoramic terrace, a lounge bar and air-conditioned rooms located in a historic building from the 19th century. WiFi is free. All the rooms at 3-star Damaso offer a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each private marble bathroom provides a free toiletries, bathrobes and slippers. A generous buffet breakfast is available daily. It includes sweets and savoury options together with hot drinks. Dietary conditions can be catered for on request. The Dama lounge bar is open every evening. Piazza Venezia, with links to Termini Train Station by bus number 64, is 800 metres away. The Vatican is reachable on foot in 20 minutes.

name: The Rome Edition
address: Salita di San Nicola da Tolentino 14, 00187 Rome
description: The Rome EDITION offers uniquely designed food and beverage outlets, including a signature restaurant with outdoor dining space that will make locals and visitors fall in love with its cuisine and all that comes with it, a Punch Room bar with exceptionally crafted cocktails; and a Rooftop Terrace where guests can have the choice of a seasonal bite, a drink overlooking the city, a private gathering with friends, or all of the above. In addition to customizable indoor and outdoor event spaces, the hotel is also home to a rooftop swimming pool, a very spacious hi tech gym, and two treatment rooms including a couple-massage experience. At the corner of modern luxury and history, the hotel is housed within a historical striking building designed by Cesare Pascoletti in collaboration with architect Marcello Piacentini, one of Italy’s most famed architects of Rationalism in the early 20th century.Marriott

name: Hotel Raffaello, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western
description: The Hotel Raffaello, Sure Hotel Collection by Best Western is a 3 Star hotel in Rome situated on a quiet street in the Rione Monti, one of the historical districts of the capital. From the hotel, you can reach all the monuments and places of interest within a few minutes’ walk such as the Colosseum, lmperial Forums, Piazza Venezia, the Basilica di Santa Maria Maggiore and Termini Railway Station. Located close to Cavour Subway Station, the Vatican Museum and the Spanish Steps are also easy to reach. Cozy, welcoming, furnished with classic taste in shades of gold, blue and red, the rooms of the Hotel Raffaello have been devised to offer a comfortable retreat, a place to enjoy some quiet time after days spent visiting museums and shops. Entirely smoke-free, the Hotel Raffaello, offers 41 comfortable rooms without carpet, equipped with 32-inch flat screen satellite TV, mini bar, free Wi-Fi, pillow menu, air-conditioning, safe, slippers and quality courtesy set. Superior suites have a beautiful private terrace overlooking the city, the ideal place to sit down and enjoy a cup of tea in a peaceful and quiet atmosphere while gazing out over the red roofs of Rome. Where not included in the rate, breakfast can be purchased at the hotel, at 9 EUR per person, per day.bestwestern.com

name: Hotel Isa
description: The Isa is a modern boutique hotel, completely non smoking. Located in the exclusive Prati district of Rome, it is a 15-minute walk from the Vatican along the banks of River Tiber. Rooms offer free Wi-Fi. Hotel Isa features elegant lounge areas, and breakfast is served on the panoramic rooftop terrace. Rooms are all air-conditioned and come with slippers and hairdryer. Each room and each floor features a different design and decor. The Pantheon and picturesque Piazza Navona are a short walk away, just across the river.

name: SuiteDreams
description: No description found

name: Relais Orso
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, as well as a bidet and an espresso maker. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a memory foam bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: The Hive Hotel
description: Featuring a shared rooftop terrace, The Hive Hotel is 300 metres from Santa Maria Maggiore Basilica. The hotel provides free WiFi throughout and air-conditioned rooms. All rooms at this property have a modern-style décor, and come with a flat-screen TV. Each room has a private bathroom with slippers, toiletries and a hairdryer, while some also include a seating area. An extensive sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is available daily. Guests can also find a bar and a restaurant serving Italian and Chinese cuisine. Domus Aurea is 1 km from the hotel, while Quirinale is a 20-minute walk away. Fiumicino International Airport is 30 km from The Hive.

name: Room Mate Gran Filippo
description: No description found

name: Chester Suites
description: No description found

name: Hotel Windrose
description: Hotel Windrose offers superior 3-star accommodation only 5 minutes' walk from Termini Station. Staff here are friendly and professional and the hotel has its own outdoor terrace. You can walk across Rome to the Coliseum or the Spanish Steps from here. Metro and bus links are close by. Offering free Wi-Fi, all of the Windrose's rooms come with air conditioning and heating. They include satellite TV, a minibar, safe and marble bathroom. A buffet breakfast is available each morning.

name: Hotel Capo d'Africa - Colosseo
description: Surrounded by traditional trattorias and wine bars, the luxurious Capo D’Africa is just 5 minutes' walk from the Coliseum. Breakfast, drinks and snacks are served up on its rooftop terrace. Featuring Italian contemporary art and modern décor, rooms here are all air conditioned. They also come with a minibar and a TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. Guests have a gym and free Wi-Fi. Breakfast is buffet style served on the roof-top terrace, cocktails and wines are available from the Centrum Bar. The L'Attico restaurant offers an à la carte menu of traditional Roman and national cuisine. Hotel Capo D’Africa provides free city maps and excellent service. Colosseo Metro Station is 5 minutes' away on foot and there are also great bus links around Rome. In the surrounding narrow streets you have a great variety of ice cream parlours, pizzerias and restaurants.

name: Trastevere Gallery Suites
description: No description found

name: Hotel principe
description: No description found

name: Rome Sweet Home Vatican
description: Rome Sweet Home Vatican features air-conditioned rooms with flat-screen TV in the Vaticano Prati district of Rome. Featuring a lift, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The guest house features family rooms. At the guest house, all rooms come with a desk. With a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and a hair dryer, rooms at Rome Sweet Home Vatican also provide guests with free WiFi, while some rooms will provide you with a balcony. At the accommodation every room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Guests at Rome Sweet Home Vatican can enjoy an Italian breakfast. Popular points of interest near the guest house include Vatican Museums, Ottaviano Metro Station and The Vatican. The nearest airport is Fiumicino Airport, 27 km from Rome Sweet Home Vatican.

name: Margutta 19 - Small Luxury Hotels Of The World
description: Margutta 19 combines high-end Italian contemporary design with serene elegance, and is a haven to return to after exploring the splendors of Rome.Relax while sipping a cocktail against an emerald-green backdrop of Borghese gardens, eat at hotel restaurant EMME, a tribute to our culinary tradition with a modern twist, featuring seasonal local ingredients and creative pairings.EMME takes traditional regional dishes to a higher level thanks to our highly trained chefs, cutting-edge cooking methods and unique fresh flavors. The menu spans from traditional delicacies to raw fish specialties paired with a vast selection of wines and freshly made cocktails.iHotelier/iStay

name: Hotel Miami
description: Hotel Miami is set in the Repubblica area of Rome, 10 minutes' walk from the Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain. Rooms are air-conditioned and have a satellite TV. Breakfast includes cappuccino, croissants, cheese and ham. The Miami's rooms are decorated in an elegant style with classic wooden furnishings, and tiled or carpeted floors. Each room has a satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom. Staff are available 24 hours a day and can book excursions and tickets for your stay in Rome. Repubblica Metro Station is a 5-minute walk from the Miami Hotel, for direct links to the Vatican. Termini Train Station is 500 metres away for buses and trains to Fiumicino Airport.

name: Rome Cavalieri, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel
description: Perched on 15-acres of private Mediterranean parkland overlooking the Eternal City and the Vatican, the Rome Cavalieri, A Waldorf Astoria Hotel offers 345 spacious guestrooms, 25 finely appointed Suites and the exclusive Imperial Club lounge. Dine at La Pergola, Rome’s first and only 3-star Michelin restaurant: peruse Europe's most prestigious private art collection, including an astonishing Tiepolo triptych and the 'Dollar Sign' series by Andy Warhol: or relax in the Rome Cavalieri Club, Rome’s most luxurious spa and fitness haven with one indoor and three beautiful outdoor pools. Completed by a large congress center able to accommodate up to 5,500 delegates, this luxury hotel is the only resort retreat in in the Eternal City, and brings new purpose to the fine art of exclusive hospitality.Hilton

name: Mercure Roma Centro Termini
description: Ideally set in the Rione Monti district of Rome, Mercure Roma Centro Termini is situated 500 metres from Quirinal Hill, 600 metres from Piazza Barberini and 600 metres from Santa Maria Maggiore. The property has a snack bar, as well as a restaurant serving Italian cuisine. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge and currency exchange for guests. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a TV with satellite channels, a kettle, a bidet, a hairdryer and a desk. At the hotel the rooms are fitted with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. Guests at Mercure Roma Centro Termini can enjoy a continental breakfast. Trevi Fountain is less than 1 km from the accommodation, while Piazza Venezia is 1 km from the property. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 14 km from Mercure Roma Centro Termini, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Fifteen Keys Hotel
description: Centrally located in the Monti district of Rome, The Fifteen Keys Hotel is a 4-minute walk from Cavour Metro Station. It offers a garden, terrace and air-conditioned rooms featuring free WiFi. Each elegant room at the 4-star Fifteen Keys will provide you with a 40-inch LCD TV with satellite channels, minibar and an electric kettle. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and Malin+Goetz toiletries. Termini Train Station is 1 metro stop from the property. The Coliseum is reachable on foot in 10 minutes.

name: Hotel Villa San Lorenzo Maria
description: Relax in the garden at this friendly hotel, set in the popular area of San Lorenzo in the centre of Rome, surrounded by typical restaurants and cafés. Rooms come with air conditioning and private bathroom. Hotel Villa San Lorenzo Maria dates back to 1910 and was once a noble residence. Now it features elegant guest rooms on 3 floors. Many rooms open out onto the garden, while others feature a small, private balcony. Start your day with a rich, buffet breakfast, which can be enjoyed in the garden or in the breakfast room, from 07:15 until 10:30. The bar is an ideal place for an aperitif after a busy day in Rome. Villa San Lorenzo Maria is well connected to Termini station and the historic centre by bus. The friendly team of staff will be on hand to provide tourist information and recommendations for all the best local attractions.

name: Babuino 181 - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
description: Step between Romes top fashion designers, disappear through discreet glass doors and enter another dimension of Italian Luxury Suites in Rome. After a day of inspiration touring Romes sites, come back to your home in Rome. The Elegant design of our hotel together with its comfort will make your stay at Babuino181 unforgettable. Sip a cocktail on the rooftop terrace overlooking Romes beautiful streets. Soak in a spacious marble bath. Slide between Frette sheets. Rest in comfortand with the confidence that, no matter what you need or what personalized service you require, Babuino 181s professional staff can make it happen.iHotelier/iStay

name: Domus Libera
description: No description found

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Rome Monti
description: Find yourself in a centrally located hotel in Rome when you make DoubleTree by Hilton Rome Monti your place to stay during your visit. The flair of Rome and all of its cultural, historical and town hotspots are conveniently near our hotel. For families, our hotel has kid-friendly amenities that will make the trip easier. Our separate convention center entrance and 3 meeting rooms also make us a great host to medium-sized events and ceremonies in Rome. When you arrive at our hotel, admire the view of the skylight and peristylium inspired design. We will greet you with our warm DoubleTree Chocolate Chip Cookie upon check-in. Unwind in one of our guest rooms featuring complimentary WiFi, minibar, coffee and tea-making facilities as well as other amenities to enhance your stay. Upgrade your room for more space, an espresso machine and more bathroom amenities, or upgrade to a suite for a separate living area. Fine dining and a great atmosphere are not far away with our main restaurant on the ground floor. It offers international cuisine for breakfast and dinner and also features a show cooking window. DoubleTree by Hilton Rome Monti is the place to be when you come to visit Rome.Hilton

name: Twentyone Hotel
description: The Twentyone is a modern boutique hotel on Via Cola di Rienzo, one of Rome's best shopping streets. Castel Sant'Angelo and the historic centre are just a pleasant 10-minute walk away. Rooms at the Twentyone Hotel are ultra modern and feature a minimalist décor. They offer an LCD satellite TV, air conditioning, minibar, and free WiFi. A continental buffet is available in a bright breakfast room. Open for lunch and dinner, the on-site restaurant serves traditional Roman and classic Italian dishes and a large selection of wines and champagne. The hotel is in the elegant Prati district, home to the Vatican and Saint Peter's Basilica, which are a 15-minute walk away. Lepanto Metro Station is 450 metres from the property, while bus links to Roma Termini Train Station are located close by.

name: Camplus Hotel Roma Centro
description: Conveniently situated in the centre of Rome, Camplus Hotel Roma Centro provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a bar. The property is non-smoking and is located 500 metres from Rome Termini Metro Station. Guest rooms in the hotel are fitted with a kettle. The private bathroom is equipped with a bidet, free toiletries and a hairdryer. At Camplus Hotel Roma Centro each room comes with a desk and a flat-screen TV. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English, Spanish, French and Italian. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Rome Termini Train Station, Repubblica - Teatro dell'Opera Metro Station and Santa Maria Maggiore. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 15 km from Camplus Hotel Roma Centro.

name: Mama Shelter Roma
description: Mama Shelter Roma is your home away from home in the heart of Rome. Our neighbourhood hotel is nested a few steps away from the Vatican treasures. Whether you are here for work or play, local or just passing through the capital, Mama Roma will look afteryou. With cutting edge design elements, Mama Shelter Roma houses 217 bedrooms. With several private atelier style meeting rooms, bars and restaurants, a rooftop with a solarium, outdoor Garden Bar and a pool, Mama Roma will both spoil and inspire you.accorhotels.com

name: Clarion Collection Hotel Principessa Isabella
description: The Clarion Collection Hotel Principessa Isabella in Rome, Italy offers easy access to some of the most famous attractions in the Capital City, including Vatican City and the Olympic Stadium, and its very close to the famous park Villa Borghese. This Rome, IT hotel is also close to the American Embassy and Piazza di Spagna. Comfortable interior corridors offer easy and safe room access, while the bar is a great place to unwind and grab a drink. A free full breakfast is available to all guests, as well as a free daily newspaper. All guest rooms offer a flat-screen TV with cable, mini-bar and desk. Some rooms feature a sofa sleeper and whirlpool. This is a pet-friendly hotel, where four-legged friends are allowed to stay for a small fee. Its perfect location and convenient access to area attractions make the Clarion Collection Hotel Principessa Isabella a great place for business and leisure travelers in the Rome, Italy area. Book a room with us today, we look forward to your stay.Choice Hotels

name: Residenza Roma Centro
description: No description found

name: Suite Opera Rooms
description: No description found

name: Hotel Alpi
description: Boasting a spacious rooftop terrace, Hotel Alpi is an Art-Nouveau style property 5 minutes' walk from Termini Train Station. Castro Pretorio Metro Station is only 300 metres from the hotel. All rooms at the Alpi Hotel are individually decorated, in either a classic or modern design. Rooms feature a kettle and an interactive flat-screen TV with satellite channels and free WiFi. Breakfast is served in the dedicated room and guests can enjoy the use of a shared Illy coffe machine. Breakfast can be enjoyed on the terrace on request. The Alpi has been owned by the same family since 1963, and the professional staff provide a personalised service. The Coliseum is only 2 metro stops, on line B, from Termini Station.

name: Hotel Vilòn
description: Steps from Rome’s famous Spanish ones, Hotel Vilòn is an elegant, art-filled boutique retreat in the shadow of the Palazzo Borghese. Esteemed neighbours aside, this former boarding school has been transformed into a small-scale hotel with just 18 rooms. Several of them overlook the Palazzo’s secret gardens; nab one with a furnished terrace suspended over them. The all-day bar extends out to the courtyard in fine weather, and you don’t have to wait for the bell to ring for the fun to start (first orders are taken at 10.30am). Don’t be fooled by the bistro’s Adelaide moniker: there’s nothing Antipodean about this seasonal Roman fare.Mr & Mrs Smith

name: 47 Boutique Hotel
description: Boasting a panoramic rooftop restaurant, Fortyseven is in the historic centre of Rome, 350 metres from the Bocca della Verità sculpture. It features a gym, steam bath, and rooms with parquet floors. Air-conditioned rooms at Hotel Fortyseven include a satellite LCD TV with Netflix and Sky, safe, minibar and Nespresso coffee machine. The private bathroom has soft bathrobes, slippers, and a hairdryer. Wi-Fi is free throughout. A continental breakfast is served daily at the buffet, while creative Mediterranean cuisine is served at the restaurant, 47 Circus Roof Garden. Guests can enjoy a cocktail at the 47 Circus Roof Garden bar, open every day until midnight. Teatro Marcello is 300 metres away, while the Jewish Ghetto is reachable on foot in around 5 minutes.

name: Rome Times Hotel
description: Strategically located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Rome. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with flat-screen TVs and complimentary Wi-Fi. Guests can enjoy the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the bar. For families Rome Times Hotel offers babysitting/child services. Equipped to ensure a comfortable stay, rooms at Rome Times Hotel offer a mini bar, a coffee maker and a private bathroom. They are all soundproofed and include an in-room safe, a laptop safe and an in-room closet. A satisfying breakfast is available each morning, and there are also numerous restaurants and cafés close by. Rome Times Hotel is conveniently located for discovering Rome with Quirinal Palace within a 10-minute walk. It is also moments from the Latium Wine Region.Revato

name: Floris Hotel
description: Boasting free WiFi throughout and a central location at the heart of the eternal city, Floris Hotel is 150 metres from Rome’s Opera Theatre. A 2-minute walk away, Repubblica Metro offers direct service to the Vatican Museums. Cakes, fine pastries and croissants, as well as cold cuts, fresh bread and cheese, are just a part of the extensive buffet breakfast. Hotel Floris also has its own bar. Air conditioning and double-glazing windows come as standard in all guest rooms, while some rooms are also soundproofed. Each room is modern and colourful, with parquet floors, a safe and minibar. Wired internet is also available for free. This non-smoking hotel is 15 minutes' walk from both the stunning Trevi Fountain and Spanish Steps. Termini Train Station is only 500 metres away.

name: Otivm Hotel
description: Situated in Rome, a short walk from Palazzo Venezia, Otivm Hotel features concierge service, a 24-hour desk and free WiFi throughout the property. Guests can also relax on the terrace. All air conditioned, guest rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a small fridge and free toiletries. Continental and buffet breakfast options are available each morning at Otivm Hotel. Synagogue of Rome is 500 metres from the hotel. Rome Ciampino Airport is 20 km from the property.

name: Fendi Private Suites
address: Via Della Fontanella Di Borghese, 48, 00187 Rome
description: A UNIQUE ROMAN EXPERIENCEThe best location in Rome:FENDI Private Suites is ideally situated right in the heart of Romea stones throw from the Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain, and within walking distance to Piazza Navona, the Pantheon and Vatican City.Services and Amenities:You can now not only shop at FENDIs flagship boutique in Rome, but stay there. The third floor of the Maisons stunning home, Palazzo FENDI, has been transformed into the worlds very first FENDI hotel.Comprised of just seven impeccably designed suites, the hotel epitomizes the ultimate in elegance and exclusivity. With exclusive access to and immersion into the FENDI world, it redefines luxury for sophisticated customers who are looking for privacy as well as a unique experience in the heart of Rome.Dominating the buzzing Via dei Condotti, this sumptuous palazzo originally belonged to the noble Boncompagni Ludovisi family. It has been the prestigious headquarters of FENDI since 2005. Palazzo FENDI is a magnificent architectural counterbalance to the sumptuous Trinit dei Monti church atop the Spanish Steps, and has been restored and restyled to create the temple of a beautiful design and high-end luxury. As well as shopping, this noble residence in the heart of Rome offers unparalleled accommodation. Here you will experience the history and tradition of aristocratic Roman elegancecombined with breathtakingly refined juxtapositions of contemporary design.iHotelier/iStay

name: Rome Marriott Grand Hotel Flora
description: Immerse in your personal Dolce Vita at the Rome Marriott Grand Hotel Flora, right on top of the noble Via Veneto and next door to the Villa Borghese gardens and the 2000 year old historic Roman walls. This gracious edifice with the stylish decor capturing the grandeur of Neoclassicism is exclusively designed for those looking for refined luxury in an atmosphere of sophistication and the highest level of welcoming hospitality anticipating every need of today's business or leisure traveller. Just sink back in the timeless elegance of the superbly appointed and newly refurbished rooms and suites. Delight in the culinary highlights of the Mediterranean cuisine at the Flora Restaurant. The adjoining bar is the ideal place to meet, to see or be seen, or to take in the flamboyant atmosphere of Via Veneto. The Flora Roof Top Terrace is the perfect setting for wedding receptions and exclusive celebrations, or simply for admiring the enchanting view over the roofs.Marriott

name: Apollo Boutique Hotel
description: Situated in Rome and with Lepanto Metro Station reachable within 300 metres, Apollo Boutique Hotel features concierge services, non-smoking rooms, a garden, free WiFi throughout the property and a shared lounge. This 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can have a drink at the bar. A continental, Italian or vegan breakfast is available each morning at the property. Popular points of interest near the hotel include Ottaviano Metro Station, Piazza del Popolo and Castel Sant'Angelo. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 17 km from Apollo Boutique Hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Adrianus Hotel
description: Located in Rome, 300 metres from Piazza Navona, Hadrianus Suites features rooms with air conditioning. Attractively set in the Rome City Centre district, this guest house is set 1 km from Castel Sant'Angelo. Torre Argentina is 1.2 km from the property. At the guest house, rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom. The rooms include a wardrobe. Continental and buffet breakfast options are available daily at a partner hotel. Pantheon is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Campo de' Fiori is 1.5 km away. Rome Ciampino Airport is 17 km from the property.

name: Hotel Artis
description: Just a 5-minute drive from Cinecittà Film Studios and 10 minutes' walk from Alessandrino Metro on line C, Hotel Artis is set in a residential area, 9 km from Rome city centre. This hotel offers free parking, free WiFi and a 24-hour front desk. The Artis features air-conditioned rooms with an LCD TV, satellite channels and a minibar. The en suite marble bathrooms feature a hairdryer. A sweet and savoury buffet breakfast is available. The on-site restaurant specialises in Italian and Roman cuisine. Rome Termini Station can be reached from the Subaugusta and Cinecittà Metro Stations in about 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Stendhal
description: Just 100 metres from Barberini Metro Station, the Stendhal is an elegant hotel mixing classic architecture with modern amenities, and having free WiFi throughout. The hotel offers a large continental buffet breakfast, and a cosy library and lounge. Rooms at Stendhal Hotel are air conditioned and spacious, and include a free minibar. Decorated in light colours, they all feature satellite TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer and toiletries. You can read, watch TV, or enjoy a cocktail in hotel's comfortable lounge. You will also find a free 24-hour internet point with WiFi access and printer. This 4-star hotel is a 5-minute walk from both the Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps. The designer shopping area around Via Condotti is also just 5 minutes away on foot. It has excellent links by metro and bus around Rome.

name: My Suites Piazza di Spagna
description: No description found

name: Stendhal Luxury Suites
description: Centrally located in Rome, Hotel Stendhal Luxury Suite is 90 metres from Barberini metro Station. This property offers free WiFi throughout and air-conditioned rooms. Elegant rooms will provide you with a satellite flat-screen TV and a minibar with free soft drinks and beer. Some feature a four-poster bed. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer. A sweet and savoury breakfast is served each morning. Guests can also enjoy it in their rooms. At Hotel Stendhal Luxury Suite you will find a 24-hour front desk. Other facilities offered at the property include a shared lounge and luggage storage. Trevi Fountain is a 7-minute walk from the property. Termini Train Station is 2 metro stops away.

name: B&B Davila 25
description: Set in a 7-storey building with lift and a stroll away from Colli Albani Metro Station on Line A, B&B Roma Appia Davila25 offers accommodation with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Roma Appia Davila25 have a private external bathroom with shower and free toiletries. They all feature a flat-screen TV, elegant furnishings and wrought iron headboards. Breakfast is self service and is available each morning in the common kitchen. Caffarella Park, which is part of the Appia Antica Regional Park, is 2 km from the property. Bus number 660 stops 200 metres away and will take you to the Catacombs of St. Sebastian. Boutiques and shops can be reached in 2 minutes by foot.

name: The Inn at the Spanish Steps
description: The Inn is a luxurious residence set in a historic building on Via Condotti, Rome's most famous shopping street, near Piazza di Spagna. Breakfast, if included in the rate, is served in the Reception's Building. All rooms at The Inn at the Spanish Steps feature air conditioning, a flat-screen satellite TV and a minibar. Slippers, bathrobes and toiletries are provided in each of the private bathrooms. Some rooms and suites have a French balcony with views of Piazza di Spagna and Via Condotti. Some rooms and suites are located in the main building, while some are set in the annex. Luxury apartments are all set in a separate building only 300 metres away. Friendly and efficient staff can arrange limousine services and sightseeing tours. An escalator and moving side-walk system leads directly from the nearby Spagna Metro Station on line A, to the famous Villa Borghese park.

name: Albergo Abruzzi
description: Only 20 metres from the Pantheon, Albergo Abruzzi is set in the Piazza della Rotonda square, in the historic centre of Rome. Guests will receive a smartphone with free calls and internet access. With free Wi-Fi, elegant rooms at Abruzzi Albergo have a minibar, an electric kettle and parquet floors. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Some rooms overlook the Pantheon. The property offers air-conditioned accommodation with a satellite flat-screen TV. An American buffet breakfast is provided daily. It is served in a local restaurant in the square. The hotel’s staff can provide you with helpful tips and tourist information. Piazza Navona is only a 5-minute walk away. Piazza di Spagna Metro Station can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

name: Suite Castrense
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and a bidet. Other amenities include Frette Italian sheets, premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, and down comforters.Expedia

name: Sensation House
description: Located in Rome, near Bologna Metro Station, Tiburtina Metro Station and Roma Tiburtina Train Station, Sensation House has a shared lounge. Free WiFi is featuredthroughout the property. Every unit features a private bathroom and bidet, air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a microwave. A toaster is also provided, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. An Italian breakfast is available daily at the bed and breakfast. Sapienza University of Rome is 2 km from Sensation House, while Rome Termini Train Station is 2.6 km away. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 24 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Palazzo Caruso
description: Situated in Rome's Piazza Barberini, Palazzo Caruso offers a terrace, free WiFi, and elegant air-conditioned rooms with a private bathroom. The Trevi Fountain is 550 metres away. With coffered ceilings, all rooms include a flat-screen TV, a minibar, and an electric kettle. The bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer. A continental breakfast is served every morning, including hot drinks, pastries, cold meat and cheese. Ciampino Airport is 16 km from the property.

name: Nazionale Palace Suites
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, as well as air conditioning and daily housekeeping. Other amenities include towels, tour/ticket assistance, multilingual staff, and luggage storage.Expedia

name: Roma Luxus Hotel
description: Roma Luxus Hotel offers free WiFi and stylish rooms in Rome's Monti district. Set 300 metres from the Roman Forum, the property also features a bar and an à la carte restaurant. Rooms at the Luxus Hotel Roma are all spacious and come with a flat-screen TV, electric kettle and air conditioning. Each room includes a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers. An extensive sweet and savoury international buffet breakfast is available daily. It includes eggs, pancakes, cheese and pastries. The hotel is 400 metres from both Piazza Venezia and Quirinale Palace, while Via Nazionale shopping street can be reached in 1 minute on foot. Rome Ciampino Airport is 15 km away.

name: Palm Suite - Small Luxury Hotels of the World
description: No description found

name: Domus Liberius
description: Located next to the Basilica of Saint Mary Major, Domus Liberius features modern rooms with free Wi-Fi. Roma Termini Train and Metro Station is 600 metres away, and the Coliseum and Spanish Steps are within a 20-minute walk of the property. The stylish rooms of this B&B are air conditioned and come with a private bathroom, a flat-screen TV and small fridge. Some rooms overlook Saint Mary Major square. Breakfast is prepared daily at the Domus Liberius and includes cereals, toast and spreads, yoghurt, as well as hot and cold drinks. The owner or staff are on site during breakfast and check-in hours. The facility is not suitable for handicapped persons, due to the numerous steps.

name: Hotel Tirreno
address: Via San Martino Ai Monti 18, 00184 Rome
description: Offering free Wi-Fi throughout, peaceful garden and central location in the heart of Rome, Hotel Tirreno is surrounded by great restaurants, 200 metres from Santa Maria Maggiore Basilica. The Tirreno is set in a historic building where used to live Il Domenichino, a famous Italian painter.
