Completely renovated, it offers air-conditioned rooms with a TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer. A continental breakfast is served each morning and includes pastries and Italian coffee. Drinks from the bar can be enjoyed out in the garden. Guests at the Tirreno Hotel have a tour desk and information point at reception, as well as a free luggage storage room for departure day. The hotel has great metro links on Line A and Line B as it is between the metro stations of Cavour and Vittorio Emanuele. It is a 15-minute walk from the Coliseum and Roman Forum.

name: Star of Rome
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and dry cleaning/laundry services, as well as daily housekeeping and blackout drapes. Other amenities include a desk, tour/ticket assistance, luggage storage, and a safe.Expedia

name: Fly Decó Hotel
address: Lungomare P. Toscanelli, 52a, 00122 Lido di Ostia, Rome
description: Facing the beachfront, Fly Decó Hotel offers 4-star accommodation in Lido di Ostia and features a garden, terrace and bar. The property is located a few steps from Ostia Lido Beach, 2.4 km from Castel Fusano Beach and 19 km from Zoo Marine. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi throughout the property. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Guest rooms will provide guests with a fridge. A continental, Italian or American breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. EUR Magliana Metro Station is 21 km from Fly Decó Hotel, while PalaLottomatica Arena is 22 km away. The nearest airport is Fiumicino Airport, 11 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel Pacific
description: Hotel Pacific boasts 50 years of welcoming tradition and experience in a completely renovated building, close to Saint Peter's Square and the Vatican Museums, elegant neighbourhood in the Eternal City. The Stadio Olimpico football stadium is 3.5 km away. Being a mere 300 meters from Cipro – Musei Vaticani Metro stop (Line A), the Pacific offers fast connection to the most prestigious landmarks of the city, including Villa Borghese, the Spanish Steps, the Trevi Fountain, Via Veneto, the Coliseum, Piazza Navona, Saint John in Lateran and many more. All the comfortable rooms of the Hotel Pacific feature their own private bathroom and double glazing for your utmost quiet. As well, most of the rooms offer either a balcony or a terrace. The welcoming I Velieri restaurant seats about 130 people and serves delicious Italian and Roman cuisine, prepared with care by the resident chef. Discover the pleasures of genuine, good food in a relaxing atmosphere.

name: Hotel Milani
description: Hotel Milani provides spacious, modern rooms with air conditioning and LCD TVs. It is located in a busy area less than a 5-minute walk from Termini Train Station. Housed in an old building, Hotel Milani has been completely refurbished. Guests can relax in the hotel's elegant lobby with marble floors, sofas and flowers, or in the comfortable TV room. There is also a bar and internet point. Hotel Milani offers a range of different room types to suit your needs. All feature satellite channels and showers. Some rooms have a free Wi-Fi internet connection while others include a spa bath. Hotel Milani's staff provide helpful and professional service. Book tours or ask for restaurant reservations at reception. Guests have a discount at a restaurant just 3 minutes' walk away.

name: Relais Giulia
description: Featuring stuccoed walls and an ancient cloister, Relais Giulia offers elegant rooms with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi. It is a 5-minute walk from Campo de' Fiori Market and Piazza Navona Square. Designed by Italian architects Christian Rocchi and Danilo Maglio, rooms at the Giulia Relais come with ultra-modern furnishings, luxury fabrics and LCD TVs. They all include a private bathroom. The lively Trastevere district, with its cafés, restaurants and shops, is just a stroll away. The Trevi Fountain and Saint Peter's Square are both a pleasant 10-minute walk from the property.

name: Millina Suites In Navona
description: No description found

name: Navona Theatre Hotel
description: Located in the heart of Rome, the Navona Theatre Hotel is set just a 5-minute walk from Piazza Navona Square. It offers air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. All rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels,a minibar and an electric kettle.The private bathroom includes a hairdryer. A buffet breakfast with sweet and savoury items is served every morning. Navona Theatre Hotel is only 400 metres from Campo de’ Fiori Square. The Pantheon is a 10-minute walk away.

name: Hotel Milo
description: Hotel Milo provides functionally furnished rooms just 5 minutes' walk from Rome Termini Station. You will have free Wi-Fi access throughout the property, plus great bus, train and Metro links. Milo's rooms are large and come with satellite TV, a minibar and a private bathroom. Some have air conditioning, available at extra charges. A continental sweet and savoury breakfast is served every morning from 07:30- 09:30. At Milo Hotel you are close to shops and typical restaurants. A 20-minute stroll will take you to the Coliseum and Milo's friendly staff can book you tours.

name: Hotel Mozart
description: The 4-star Hotel Mozart offers elegant accommodation in Rome’s centre, just around the corner from the main shopping street, Via Del Corso. It features free Wi-Fi, a restaurant, and a roof garden with views of Rome’s rooftops. Rooms combine classic-style décor and furniture with modern amenities such as an LCD TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. Some rooms face the main street, while others overlook the internal courtyard. In the morning, a rich breakfast buffet is available. This includes traditional Italian coffee, along with fruit pies, freshly baked croissants and homemade pastries. A free internet point is available in the hotel’s lobby. Mozart Hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Spanish Steps and Spagna Metro Station. In 10 minutes on foot you can reach the Trevi Fountain.

name: Al Manthia Hotel
description: Al Manthia Hotel is right in the heart of Rome just 100 metres from Barberini metro stop and a 5-minute walk from the Trevi Fountain. This charming hotel is set in a historic building that dates back to the late 1800s. It features a cosy lounge and a dining room where a continental buffet breakfast is served each morning. Rooms are air conditioned and feature Wi-Fi access, a minibar and a TV with satellite channels. Al Manthia Hotel is close to the Quirinale Palace and a short stroll from the Spanish Steps. You have excellent access to public transportation, including both bus and metro lines.

name: Tmark Hotel Vaticano
description: With a stay at Tmark Hotel Vaticano in Rome (Rome City Centre), you'll be steps from Vatican Museums and 14 minutes by foot from St. Peter's Basilica. Featured amenities include limo/town car service, a computer station, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Guests may use a cruise ship terminal shuttle for a surcharge, and limited parking is available onsite.Hotels.com

name: Hotel Camelia
description: Situated conveniently in the centre of Rome, Hotel Camelia offers continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers luggage storage space. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The units will provide guests with a minibar. Languages spoken at the reception include English, Spanish, French and Italian, and guests are invited to request information on the area when needed. Popular points of interest near Hotel Camelia include Rome Termini Metro Station, Rome Termini Train Station and Repubblica - Teatro dell'Opera Metro Station. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 15 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Dimora degli Dei
description: No description found

name: A Trastevere da M.E
description: No description found

name: Esposizione Boutique
description: Well located in the centre of Rome, Esposizione Boutique is within 500 metres of Quirinal Hill and 800 metres of Barberini Metro Station. The property is close to Santa Maria Maggiore, Colosseo Metro Station and Repubblica - Teatro dell'Opera Metro Station. The accommodation provides a shared lounge and a 24-hour front desk for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. The rooms come with a kettle, while selected rooms are equipped with a balcony and others also offer city views. At Esposizione Boutique each room comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Piazza Barberini, Piazza Venezia and Cavour Metro Station. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 15 km from Esposizione Boutique, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Hotel Filippo
description: No description found

name: Mama’s Home Rome
description: No description found

name: iH Hotels Roma Cicerone
description: Hotel Cicerone is set in an elegant building, 450 metres from Lepanto Metro and 15 minute's walk from the Vatican Museums. WiFi is free, and a varied American breakfast is served daily. With air conditioning and classic-style décor, all rooms at the Cicerone include satellite TV. Some rooms also come with tea and coffee making facilities and luxury toiletries. The hotel’s Cucina & Pizza restaurant serves classic Italian cuisine and Roman specialities. At the property’s stylish bar, guests can enjoy cocktails and snacks. Castel Sant’Angelo is a 5-minute walk from the property, while Via Cola di Rienzo, a popular shopping street, is just metres away. Shuttles to Fiumicino Airport leave from Piazza Cavour, 200 metres from Cicerone Hotel.

name: Hotel Villafranca
description: Hotel Villafranca is in central Rome, 50 metres from Castro Pretorio Metro Station and 1 metro stop from Termini Train Station. An American breakfast is served each morning at this hotel featuring free WiFi throughout. Rooms have either a classic or modern design. All air-conditioned, they also feature a TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels, a small fridge and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. Hotel Villafranca has excellent public transport links around Rome. The Coliseum and Roman Forum are just 5 minutes away by Metro. The neighbourhood has plenty of cafés and restaurants. Staff provide tourist information and reserve restaurants, tours or museum tickets.

name: Antico Albergo del Sole al Pantheon
description: Centrally located, Hotel Sole Al Pantheon offers easy access to Rome's popular shopping and sightseeing areas. This modern hotel is an ideal choice for discovering the local vineyards as it is situated in the Latium Wine Region. Hotel Sole Al Pantheon features a 24/7 reception, as well as free Wi-Fi and meeting rooms. For added convenience, it offers limited hours room service, a safe and porters. Just a stone's throw from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to discover the best of the local nightlife. Hotel Sole Al Pantheon provides 32 air conditioned rooms. A mini bar, a flat-screen TV and a walk-in closet are also included. Enjoy a relaxing aperitif in the hotel's cosy lounge bar, before heading off to the restaurant for an evening meal. For those preferring to dine out, the local neighbourhood offers several bars and restaurants serving a range of varied cuisines. Rome's attractions, such as Trevi Fountain and Piazza Navona, are within easy walking distance of Hotel Sole Al Pantheon. It is within a short stroll from Pantheon.Revato

name: Hotel Oxford
description: Set in Rome’s most exclusive area, Hotel Oxford is set just behind Via Veneto and the Spanish Steps. Guest rooms feature elegant furnishings and wood or carpeted floors. Experience the real Dolce Vita in this elegant setting. The rooms come with air conditioning and a private bathroom, and some have a balcony. Apartments are also available, and are located in separate buildings in nearby Via Piave or Via Flavia. At the Oxford Hotel you have free internet terminals and free Wi-Fi in all areas. This hotel features 2 meeting rooms. Located inside the Oxford is Q'4RT, the property's café, restaurant and wine shop. They offer wine and olive oil tastings from an extensive gourmet selection, and are open every day for lunch and dinner. Start your day with an Italian buffet breakfast. In the evening, try some typical Roman cuisine at the traditional restaurant. Choose from a mix of fresh pasta, pizza, and meat and fish dishes. Save room for a delicious dessert or fresh seasonal fruit.

name: Albergo Santa Chiara Hotel Rome
description: Just 200 metres from Rome's Pantheon, Albergo Santa Chiara offers a terracce and air-conditioned rooms set in a historical building. WiFi is free throughout. Rooms at the Santa Chiara are decorated with elegant furnishings and have carpeted or wooden floors. Each comes with a minibar and a satellite flat-screen TV. A continental a la carte breakfast is served daily. Guests can enjoy cappuccino and fruit juice together with pastries, ham and cheese. Gluten-free options are also available. The Santa Chiara Hotel is 200 metres from Largo Argentina, where buses depart for Saint Peter’s Basilica and Termini Station. Piazza Navona is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Corso Vittorio 308
description: Corsovittorio308 is a Guest House located in the centre of Rome, a 10-minute walk from the Vatican City. This air-conditioned property offers luggage storage facilities and a safe. Free WiFi access is available throughout. Bedrooms include a free minibar and an electric kettle. The private bathrooms come with either a bath or shower and a hairdryer. For guests who wish to explore the city of Rome, Piazza Navona is a 10-minute walk from the property and the Pantheon is 1 km away. Rome Fiumicino Airport is 30 km from Corsovittorio308.

name: Hotel Contilia
description: Offering free WiFi throughout and 24-hour room service, Hotel Contilia is just 200 metres from Roma Termini Train Station. Santa Maria Maggiore Basilica is a 3-minute walk away. All rooms have air conditioning and traditional furnishings. Satellite LCD TV and a private bathroom comes as standard in all rooms, and all but 2 also include a minibar. Breakfast is buffet style and drinks are available at the bar, which is open throughout the day. The attentive staff are on hand to give recommendations for nearby restaurants. Via Nazionale, a popular shopping street, is a 10-minute walk from the hotel. The Coliseum and the Trevi Fountain are both 2 stops away from Termini.

name: Grand Hotel Plaza
description: Located 350 metres from the Spanish Steps in Rome, the prestigious Grand Hotel Plaza is set in a restored historical building from 1860. It features 2 panoramic terraces and elegant accommodation with high ceilings and Carrara marble. The Grand Hotel Plaza has preserved many of its original features and impressive Mongiardino interior decor, including the unique Salone delle Feste ballroom. The hotel has also been featured in many famous films. All individually designed rooms and suites come with air conditioning and free WiFi. Each of the suites boasts a spacious terrace with spectacular views over some of the major monuments of Rome, including the Spanish Steps and St. Peter's Basilica. The Carrara marble bathrooms include a Sorelle Fontana courtesy set. Terrazza Accademia di Francia, open all year round, is the ideal setting for a relaxing drink with impressive views of Villa Borghese and the Church of Saint Carlo al Corso’s dome. An American breakfast is served daily in the elegant Salone Mascagni hall, and includes homemade products and pastries. The Sorelle Fontana Restaurant, which features original sketches from famous designers, serves Mediterranean cuisine with seasonal and local ingredients. Grand Hotel Plaza is located on the popular shopping street of Via del Corso, and a 2-minute walk from designer shops along Via dei Condotti.

name: Hotel Patria
description: Located near Piazza della Repubblica, Hotel Patria offers friendly service and a central location in Rome within walking distance of main sites and the Termini Railway Station. Walk to the Repubblica Metro Station in 5 minutes from Hotel Patria. Restaurants, shops and boutiques are all close by. Set in an old building, Hotel Patria provides a 24-hour front desk and a bar. WiFi is free in the reception area. Hotel Patria features comfortable rooms with flat-screen TVs, en suite bathrooms and air conditioning. Hotel staff will assist you with tourist information, sightseeing suggestions and airport transfers (Additional paid service).

name: Carrara 24
description: No description found

name: Relais Fontana di Trevi
description: Right next to the Trevi Fountain and with free WiFi throughout, the Relais serves breakfast out on its roof terrace overlooking the world-famous fountain. Rooms have an elegant design and come with air conditioning. Guest rooms are well equipped and include a TV with satellite channels and tea and coffee-making facilities. Each one has a private bathroom with hairdryer. Relais Fontana di Trevi is not only close to 1 of Rome's most famous fountains. The Spanish Steps and the Pantheon are less than 10 minutes away on foot. Fontana di Trevi Relais is surrounded by shops, cafés and traditional Roman restaurants. Barberini Metro Station is 5 minutes' walk away. Please note that the main building features a lift, but guests will have to climb a few steps to reach it. Staff will help you with your luggage.

name: Tree Charme Augusto Luxury Suites
description: Well set in the centre of Rome, Tree Charme Augusto Luxury Suites provides free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. This 3-star hotel offers a concierge service and luggage storage space. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from Piazza Navona. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Tree Charme Augusto Luxury Suites every room comes with bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Trevi Fountain, Castel Sant'Angelo and Piazza del Popolo. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 16 km from Tree Charme Augusto Luxury Suites, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: The Style
description: Just 400 metres from the Spanish Steps and Via Condotti, The Style is set in the heart of Rome's historic centre. The functional, en suite rooms come with air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. Featuring air conditioning, all rooms at the The Style come with modern furniture, a flat-screen TV and free WiFi. The private marble bathrooms are complete with large shower and hairdryer. The property is set in a historic building from the 19th century. A buffet breakfast is available daily in the lounge on the ground floor. It includes sweet and savoury items, hot and cold drinks, yoghurt. Lactose- and gluten-free products are available upon request. Located less than a 5-minute walk from Spagna Metro Station, The Style is 400 metres from the Trevi Fountain. The property is 100 metres from a bus stop with links to Roma Termini Train Station.

name: Superior Relais
description: No description found

name: Hotel Lord Byron
description: Hotel Lord Byron is located in Rome’s classy and elegant Parioli district, just behind the Borghese Gardens. This exclusive hotel offers calm, quiet surroundings, excellent service and beautiful interiors. One of the Small Luxury Hotels of the World, the hotel is situated in one of the charming town houses common to this part of Rome. Admire stylish, Art Deco furnishings and enjoy the luxurious rooms and lounges. Via Veneto and the Spanish Steps are a 15-minute walk away from Hotel Lord Byron. Villa Borghese’s attractions, from the zoo to the famous art gallery are even closer. After a day out discovering Rome, spend an evening at peaceful Hotel Lord Byron. Enjoy a few drinks at Il Salotto, the hotel’s lounge bar before moving on to the hotel restaurant. Enjoy award-winning regional cuisine accompanied by excellent Italian and foreign wines.

name: Martina Suites
description: No description found

name: Trianon Borgo Pio
description: Located on a quiet street between Castel Sant'Angelo and the Vatican City, Trianon Borgo Pio provides friendly service and spacious, self-catering apartments in Rome's historical centre. WiFi is free throughout. Trianon Borgo Pio is set in an area where you can easily find supermarkets, restaurants, and cafés. Ottaviano Metro Station is a 10-minute walk away. All with modern furnishings and cleaned daily, apartments here include a fully equipped kitchen, individually controlled air conditioning, satellite TV, and a private bathroom. Top-floor apartments have a small balcony with city views. A continental buffet breakfast is served daily, and can be enjoyed on the terrace with views of St. Peter's Dome. Other facilities include a fitness area, meeting room as well as a laundry room featuring washing machine and dryer. Multilingual staff are available throughout the day and will assist you with transfer services, car rental and tourist information.

name: Hotel Garda
description: Housed in an elegant period building next to the Borghese Gardens, Hotel Garda offers a quiet location close to all Rome’s attractions and just around the corner from fabulous Via Veneto. Both the Spanish Steps and Trevi Fountain are a 5-minute walk away, and Via Condotti and Via del Corso shopping streets are also within easy walking distance. Just a few steps away you will find the Spagna Metro stop which will take you directly to St Peter’s square, as well as to the main train station. At the Garda Hotel you can relax in the TV lounge or library, or enjoy a drink at the bar. Multilingual staff is happy to help you with any matter, from providing information to reserving tickets or a table for you.

name: Hotel Duca d'Alba
description: Set 450 metres from the Roman Forum and the Coliseum in Rome, Hotel Duca D’Alba is housed in a 19th-century town house in the Monti district. It offers air-conditioned rooms and free WiFi throughout. Rooms have satellite flat-screen TV and a marble bathroom with a hairdryer and free toiletries. This hotel with 24-hour reception is surrounded by ethnic shops, restaurants and bars. Cavour Metro Station, on line B, is just 50 metres away. The Trevi Fountain can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

name: Casa Santa Sofia
address: Piazza Della Madonna Dei Monti 3, 00184 Rome
description: Conveniently located in Rome's city centre, 500 metres from the Coliseum, Casa Santa Sofia offers accommodation with free high-speed internet connection. Rooms at the property feature a private bathroom. Guests can also enjoy a glass of fine Italian wine and canapes or relax at the rooftop wine bar. Casa Santa Sofia is 250 metres from Cavour Metro Station, providing fast links with other areas in Rome. The main shopping street Via Del Corso can be reached on foot in 10 minutes.

name: 4vaticanrooms
description: No description found

name: Relais Calamatta
description: No description found

name: Abitart Hotel
description: The design hotel Abitart is situated in the heart of the Ostiense neighbourhood, close to Ostiense Railway and Metro Station, which provides quick access to all of Rome, including Fiumicino Airport. Rooms at the Abitart are elegant and each is inspired to a particular artistic style. All rooms have satellite TV and free Wi-Fi. Guests enjoy an extensive American breakfast buffet daily. Eataly Roma, the famous high-end Italian food market chain, is less than 10 minutes' walk away.

name: Palazzo Dama
description: Offering a free outdoor pool and a garden with lemon trees, Palazzo Dama is set 200 metres from Piazza del Popolo and a 10-minute walk from The Spanish Steps. The hotel has a lounge bar, a restaurant and spacious rooms with free Sky channels and parquet floors. WiFi is free throughout. All air conditioned, rooms here include a flat-screen TV and a minibar. Some rooms have a seating area. The private bathroom comes with free toiletries Acqua di Parma and hairdryer. A sweet and savoury continental-style breakfast buffet is available daily. Flaminio Metro is 500 metres from the property, while Villa Borghese park is a 5-minute walk away. Both Ciampino and Fiumicino airports are within a 45-minute drive of Palazzo Dama.

name: Hotel Vite - By Naman Hotellerie
description: Located in Rome’s historic centre, 500 metres from the Spanish Steps, HOTEL VITE - By Naman Hotellerie offers free Wi-Fi throughout. The air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each has a private bathroom equipped with free toiletries and a hairdryer. Some also have city views. Villa Borghese Gardens are a 10-minute walk from HOTEL VITE - By Naman Hotellerie. Rome Termini Train Station is 2 km away.

name: Casa Heberart Guest House Capo Le Case
description: No description found

name: Gioberti Art Hotel
description: Set in a 19th-century building, Gioberti Art Hotel offers modern rooms with free WiFi, just 50 metres from Termini Train Station. Guests can enjoy a rich buffet breakfast every morning. All air-conditioned rooms feature bold colours and contemporary décor. They come with a minibar, flat-screen TV and private bathroom. A concierge service and 24-hour front desk are available. Santa Maria Maggiore church is a five-minute walk from the Gioberti. The Rome Opera House is 550 metres away.

name: Comfort Hotel Bolivar
description: The Comfort Hotel Bolivar is situated within walking distance of the Colosseum and popular area attractions, including the Trevi Fountain, Spanish Steps and the famous Via Veneto. The hotel is just minutes from the Termini railway station, the easiest way for connections to reach both the Ciampino and the Leonardo da Vinci Fiumicino Airport. Piazza Venezia, a famous city square, is right around the corner. A variety of restaurants and cocktail lounges are located in the surrounding area. Be sure to stop by the American-style bar at the hotel for a drink in the lobby. Guests can enjoy a free full breakfast every morning in a lovely breakfast room with a special view on the historical center. All guest rooms are equipped with new bathrooms, mini-bars, hair dryers, flat TVs, free WiFi, air conditioning and safes. Select rooms also have balconies. Non-smoking and handicap accessible rooms are available upon request. Private guest parking is located on the premises for convenience. This pet-friendly hotel also provides a currency exchange, car rental service and valet cleaning services. The Comfort Hotel Bolivar has a quiet and convenient location, which combined with its superior accommodations, helps make it the perfect place for all travelers to stay and visit the heart of Rome.Choice Hotels

name: Palazzo Medusa
description: No description found

name: Parco Delle Valli
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and a full-sized refrigerator/freezer, as well as free WiFi and an LCD TV. Other amenities include a memory foam bed, a hair dryer, towels, and bathrobes.Expedia

name: Aleph Rome Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton
description: Welcome to Aleph Rome Hotel, Curio Collection by Hilton, set in the heart of the city. Once a bank headquarters, the hotel has been fully renovated while maintaining the authentic Cipollino marble and charming architecture. Walk to the Spanish Steps, Trevi Fountain and Villa Borghese, or shop the luxury Italian brands along the Trident streets. There’s a wealth of beautiful sites and museums nearby including the Colosseum, Roman Forum and Vatican Museum. Unwind in a guest room with modern Italian furniture, high ceilings, marble floors, and modern comforts like complimentary WiFi, an interactive TV, Nespresso® machine and walk-in shower. Suites offer a separate living area, bar cabinet and guest bathroom, plus welcome gifts and complimentary services. Choose the Barberini Suite for your own private terrace overlooking the rooftops of Rome. Enjoy gourmet cuisine throughout our restaurants and lounges. Restaurant 1930 serves creative local dishes including a lunch buffet, and Sky Blu on the rooftop has a genuine Italian setting. The Onyx Lobby Lounge and Bar is popular with guests and locals alike – try a signature Aleph cocktail – and our Cognac Lounge is a unique place in the city to enjoy your cigar and spirits. Book indulgent treatments in our spa, and relax in the indoor and rooftop pools. Plan events in stylish spaces that accommodate board meetings up to lavish weddings. Dedicated planners and the latest A/V technology ensure your event is a success. Hilton Honors program available.Hilton

name: Feronia Guest house
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a rainfall showerhead and free WiFi, as well as a flat-screen TV and a bidet. Other amenities include Egyptian cotton sheets, premium bedding, a Select Comfort bed, and laundry facilities.Expedia

name: Holiday Inn Express Rome - East
description: A 15-minute drive from Rome’s centre, GP Hotel has free parking and a 24-hour bar. It offers modern air-conditioned rooms with a satellite LED TV and Wi-Fi is free throughout. Rooms at GP Hotel come with carpeted floors and soundproofing. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A safe is available at reception. A buffet breakfast of pastries, ham, cheese and boiled eggs is provided daily. Guests can enjoy drinks or snacks at the Café Bar, which is open daily. The area has a number of restaurants serving local cuisine and Roman thin-crust pizza. Palmiro Togliatti Station is 900 metres from the GP Hotel. Ciampino Airport is less than 15 km from the property.

name: Room Mate Filippo
description: Featuring a fitness centre, free WiFi, and a terrace, Room Mate Filippo offers elegant rooms 200 metres from Barberini Metro. The Spanish Steps are 500 metres from the property. All air conditioned and spacious, rooms here include a flat-screen TV and a minibar. The private bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a buffet breakfast. The Trevi Fountain is a 10-minute walk from the property, while Termini Station is 3 metro stops away.

name: Relais Luxury Corso
description: No description found

name: Hotel Eden - Dorchester Collection
description: No description found

name: Bv Oly Hotel
address: Via Santuario Regina Degli Apostoli, 36, 00145 Rome
description: BV Hotel Oly is in a quiet area of Rome's business district EUR, a 10-minute walk from San Paolo Metro Station. Free WiFi is provided in the entire hotel, which is less than 1 km from St. Paul's Basilica. Rooms at BV Hotel Oly are spacious and air conditioned. Each includes a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels, and a minibar. Your day at the BV Hotel Oly starts with a buffet breakfast of scrambled eggs and homemade cakes together with hot drinks and juices. Staff are always available to offer useful tourist and travel information. The Coliseum is just 4 metro stops away. Outdoor parking is free, while the indoor garage comes at an additional cost.

name: Aelius B&B by Roma Inn
description: Just a 5-minute walk from Repubblica Metro Station and Termini Train Station, Aelius is centrally located in Rome city centre. It offers rooms with free Wi-Fi. Rooms at the Aelius are located on the second and third floor of a historic Roman building. All rooms are air conditioned and come with warm colour schemes and tiled floors. In-room facilities include a TV and a fridge. Breakfast is served in a nearby café. The Aelius is just a 15-minute walk from the Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps. The towels are changed every 3 days.

name: Hotel Shangri-La Roma
description: Located in Rome and with PalaLottomatica Arena reachable within 1.1 km, Hotel Shangri-La Roma by OMNIA hotels provides concierge services, allergy-free rooms, a shared lounge, free WiFi and a bar. Built in 1969, this 4-star hotel is within 1.4 km of EUR Fermi Metro Station and 2.6 km of Laurentina Metro Station. The accommodation offers room service, a tour desk and currency exchange for guests. At the hotel, each room includes a desk. Complete with a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and free toiletries, all units at Hotel Shangri-La Roma by OMNIA hotels have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and selected rooms have a terrace. Guest rooms include a safety deposit box. A continental breakfast is available daily at the accommodation. Speaking Arabic, English, Spanish and French, staff are willing to help at the 24-hour front desk. EUR Magliana Metro Station is 3.4 km from Hotel Shangri-La Roma by OMNIA hotels, while Basilica San Paolo Metro Station is 4.9 km away. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 15 km from the hotel.

name: Borghese Contemporary Hotel
description: Borghese Contemporary Hotel, renewed this spring 2023, is set in the heart of historic Rome, a 5-minute walk from the popular shopping area around the Spanish Steps. It features a pretty inner courtyard. The Hotel is located inside an 18th century building previosly owned by the Borghese family. All rooms are equipped with Chromecast TV system and active USB charger. Reception is open 24 hours a day. Here you can book museum tickets and get lots of useful tourist information. The Pantheon and Piazza Navona are both around 10 minutes away on foot. Room automation and IPTV system Separate heating and air conditioning management in the bedroom.

name: Unaway Hotel Empire Roma
description: With a classy, elegant design, embellished by valuable architectural elements and precious marbles, the UNAWAY Empire Palace Hotel Roma is a refined 4 star superior hotel located in Rome's historical center, just a few steps from the famous Via Veneto. The hotel was built from the charming spaces of the palace erected in 1870 by the Mocenigo, a noble Venetian family, as their own residence. The UNAWAY Empire Palace Hotel Roma welcomes its guests in comfy rooms and suites, tempts their taste buds with its restaurant that reinterprets the best Mediterranean cuisine and cheers them up with a suggestive cocktail bar for drinks and aperitifs and a fine courtyard where to enjoy lunches and dinners or pamper themselves to relaxing moments. Business clients may count on modern meeting rooms with natural light and view on the city roofs that can be modulated according to the different needs.iHotelier/iStay

name: Navona Stay
description: No description found

name: Maison Villa Torlonia
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, as well as a toilet with electronic bidet and climate control. Other amenities include premium bedding, down comforters, towels, and kitchenware and utensils.Expedia

name: Damiani & Sister Guest House
description: Located 1.5 km from San Giovanni in Laterano, Damiani & Sister Guesthouse features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. Each room comes with a flat-screen TV, and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Some rooms have a balcony. A kitchenette and a terrace are available to guests. A self-service breakfast of croissants and tea or coffee is provided daily. Re Di Roma Metro Station is just 500 metres from Damiani & Sister Guesthouse. Roma Tuscolana Train Station is a 5-minute walk away.

name: Andromeda
description: No description found

name: Hotel Giardino D'Europa
description: Located by the exit 21/22 of Rome's GRA orbital road, Hotel Giardino d'Europa offers an outdoor pool, a restaurant and free parking. Rooms come with free Wi-Fi, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. At the Giardino d'Europa the rooms have tiled floors, wooden headboards, and classic furniture. The private bathrooms are complete with a hairdryer and toiletry set. Breakfast is buffet style, with a choice of cold meats, sweet pastries and cereals. The restaurant serves both international dishes and Italian favourites. Ciampino Airport is just 4 km away. The hotel can arrange a shuttle service to Ciampino Airport. A shuttle service to/from Anagnina Metro is offered free of charge from 8:15 until 18:00 at scheduled time.

name: Hotel Giolitti
description: Set 750 metres from Termini Train Station in Rome, Hotel Giolitti provides air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The Colosseum is a 20-minute walk away. Rooms here come equipped with a desk, safe and satellite flat-screen TV. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. A sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is prepared daily, served in the garden patio. It includes cold cuts, cheese, and pastries. Hotel Giolitti features a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage and a vending machine. Vittorio Emanuele Metro Stop is 750 metres away. Ciampino Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Des Epoques
description: Featuring elegantly furnished rooms, Hotel Des Epoques is set 700 metres from Rome’s Castro Pretorio Metro. WiFi is free throughout. All air conditioned, rooms here come with satellite TV, parquet floors, and an electric kettle. The private bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries. Policlinico Umberto Primo hospital is 10 minutes’ walk from the Des Epoques. Termini Station is 1.3 km away and can be reached by metro in just 1 stop.

name: Appia Park Hotel
description: The Appia Park Hotel is set on the most important road of antique Rome; the Appian Way was built to connect the capital to Brindisi in Southern Italy. This elegant hotel, surrounded by greenery, is immersed in history and is close to the ancient ruins of the Acqua Felice Aqueduct. The Appia Antica Park and Acqua Santa golf course are also nearby. The Appia Park Hotel offers a high quality service and comfortable guest rooms all featuring private balconies. If you are in Rome on business there are a number of conference rooms available even for large parties. The hotel is conveniently located for those travelling to and from Ciampino airport, just 5 km away. The historic centre of Rome, only 7 km away, is easily reached by public transport.

name: Palazzo Manfredi
description: Admire an outstanding view of the Coliseum over breakfast at the rooftop terrace at Hotel Palazzo Manfredi. Rooms here are spacious and offer free Wi-Fi and Sky TV. With such a central location, a 2-minute walk from Colosseo Metro Station, getting around Rome is easy. Some units has a view of the ancient ruins along the Roman Forum. Other room amenities include a bathrobe and slippers, as well as a minibar and pay-per-view channels. Palazzo Manfredi also offers a self-catering option. The apartments are located in the same historic area of Rome and feature living rooms and kitchenettes. Cocktails and light snacks can also be served out on the terrace. If you really want to see Rome in style, you can rent a Lamborghini sports car from reception.

name: J.K. Place Roma
description: Offering stylish rooms with free WiFi, J.K. Place Roma is situated in the heart of Rome with the Spanish Steps and the Pantheon each a 10-minute walkaway. A breakfast à la carte is included. All the rooms come with air conditioning, free minibar, a satellite flat-screen TV and Bose SoundLink Mini system. Slippers, bathrobes, and free toiletries are supplied in each private bathroom. The interiors are designed by Michele Bonan and feature rosewood canopy and handmade fabric beds. The marble bathrooms are complete with a large glass shower and bidet. The on-site restaurant features Italian and international cuisine with daily fresh produce. Piazza del Popolo is a 10-minute walk from the property, while Termini Train Station is 2.5 km away.

name: Hotel Emona Aquaeductus
description: Hotel Emona Aquaeductus is a small villa with its own quiet garden set in central Rome, 500 metres from Manzoni Metro Station on line A. Buses for the Vatican and Termini Train Station run from Piazza di Porta Maggiore 50 metres away. Your room has air conditioning, a minibar, and a satellite TV. Bathrooms are in marble, and free Wi-Fi is provided. Some rooms have a spa bath. Emona Aquaeductus Hotel provides free daily newspapers and a laptop in the lobby. Breakfast may be served in the garden. The bar and reception are open 24 hours a day. Staff are multilingual and can assist you with tourist and travel info.

name: Hotel Imperatori
description: Near Rome's GRA ring road, Degli Imperatori features elegant rooms with free Wi-FI. Rooms at Hotel IMPERATORI also include air conditioning, satellite and digital LCD TV. The marble bathroom has either a bath or shower. Buffet breakfast is served from 07:00 until 10:30. Local buses stop just 20 metres from Degli Imperatori Hotel, and provide quick connection to the city’s metro. The Coliseum is a 15-minute metro ride away.

name: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's
description: Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's is on the historic Via Aurelia Antica, 5 km from the Vatican and very close to the lush Villa Pamphili Park. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. This Crowne Plaza is surrounded by its private park. Massages and beauty treatments can be booked on site. The spa is free for all guests as well as the 2 tennis courts and the outdoor swimming pool, open during the summer and featuring a pool bar. There is also a free fitness centre open 24 hours a day. Rooms are spacious and come with modern furnishings. The buffet breakfast is American-style. The restaurant is open all day long and serves delicious, Italian cuisine. During summer meals are served on the terrace. There is also a business centre. Crowne Plaza Rome - St. Peter's offers free parking. A scheduled transfer service to/from Rome Fiumicino Airport is arranged on request, at extra costs. Buses stop outside the hotel and there is a taxi station on site.

name: Hotel Lunetta
description: Offering a free spa centre and stylish rooms with free Wi-Fi and a 32” LCD TV, the 4-star Hotel Lunetta is in central Rome, just 200 metres from Piazza Navona. The top-floor terrace overlooks Rome’s rooftops. Rooms are air conditioned and soundproofed and have an elegant combination of black and white colours. Each one also comes with refined parquet floors and modern furniture. Some feature wood-beamed ceilings. A varied breakfast buffet is served in a small but colourful breakfast room until 10:30. It includes homemade cakes and croissants, along with cold cuts, cheese, scrambled eggs and bacon. The hotel bar is perfect for a drink or snack and is open until 14:00. Less than 100 metres from Campo De’ Fiori square, Lunetta Hotel is a 15-minute walk from St Peter’s Basilica. The Pantheon is 700 metres away.

name: NH Collection Roma Fori Imperiali
description: Stay in one of Rome’s most important archaeological areas when you choose the five-star NH Collection Roma Fori Imperiali. This brand new hotel is on the edge of the historic Imperial Forums site, and guests can enjoy stunning views of the ruins from selected rooms. The hotel is also convenient for Rome’s other major attractions, including the Colosseum and the Vatican, as well as being close to the restaurants and bars of Monti, and Rome’s main shopping areas. The hotel has 42 freshly decorated rooms, including superior rooms, premium rooms, Junior Suite, suites and accessible rooms. They all feature large flat-screen TVs with international channels, free Wi-Fi and coffee machines. A choice of pillows and super-comfortable mattresses assure a good night’s sleep. Guests start the day with eggs, fruit, pastries, cold meats and Italian specialities from the à la carte buffet, while the local pasta dishes and Mediterranean cuisine served in the hotel restaurant takes care of dinner. One of the hotel’s highlights is the beautiful terrace bar. On the top floor, it offers panoramic views of the Imperial Forums, churches and cityscape. Having a cocktail or aperitive here as the sun sets over the city is an experience never to be forgotten.NH Hoteles

name: B&B Hotel Roma Pietralata Tiburtina
description: No description found

name: Suite Inn Rome
description: No description found

name: Loly Boutique Hotel Roma
description: Located in Rome, 500 metres from Piazza di Santa Maria in Trastevere, Loly Boutique Hotel Roma provides accommodation with a terrace, private parking, a restaurant and a bar. With free WiFi, this 4-star hotel offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. The property is 1.7 km from the city centre and 1.3 km from Campo de' Fiori. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. At Loly Boutique Hotel Roma every room has bed linen and towels. The daily breakfast offers continental, Italian or American options. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Roma Trastevere Train Station, Largo di Torre Argentina and Palazzo Venezia. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 16 km from Loly Boutique Hotel Roma.

name: Navona Residenza de Charme
description: No description found

name: Relais San Lorenzo in Lucina
description: No description found

name: Hotel Relais dei Papi
description: Just 500 metres from Lepanto Metro Station on line A, Hotel Relais Dei Papi is 5 minutes’ walk from St. Peter's Square and the Vatican Museums. All air-conditioned, rooms come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV. With excellent public transport links, Relais Dei Papi consists of 4 floors, and is 2 metro stops from the Spanish Steps and a 20-minute ride from the Coliseum. Rome's famous Cola di Rienzo shopping street is around the corner, and discounts are available at a garage just 50 metres away. A breakfast buffet including cereals, croissants and fruit juices is served daily in the breakfast room. Reception is open 24 hours a day. You can book an exclusive session at the on-site paid spa. The free gym is open at shceduled times during the day. Each room has a private bathroom complete with hairdryer and toiletry set.

name: Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George
description: Welcome to Hotel Indigo Rome - St. George. The hotel boasts a privileged position for discovering the wonders of the Eternal City. 5-star luxury boutique hotel located in the enchanting Via Giulia, in the heart of the historic center of Rome, a few steps from Piazza Navona, Campo de' Fiori, Castel Sant'Angelo and the Vatican Museums. 5-star luxury hotel Rome historic centre: Local inspiration. The boutique Hotel Indigo® Rome - St. George is characterized by an atmosphere full of charm and history. The ancient Renaissance walls surround the contemporary design environments and the modern interiors blend perfectly with important historical testimonies. The large travertine stones on the facade, which come from the Colosseum, recall the shape of modern sofas. The building's Renaissance style and travertine marble walls decorate the lobby, restaurant and bar, all examples of great eras. During the summer season, I Sofà Bar Restaurant & Roof Terrace moves to the panoramic terrace of the hotel, offering a breathtaking view over the roofs and monuments of Rome. Our chef chooses 0 km products and offers tasty "Roman" recipes, preferring products of the season. Treat yourself to some relaxation in the St. George Spa, the hotel's wellness centre, consisting of a sauna, Turkish bath, large whirlpool tub and mini-gym. From this boutique hotel you can discover the delightful shops of Rione Regola.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Anastasio Vatican Rooms
address: 139 Via Anastasio II Scala D, primo piano, 00165 Rome
description: Situated in Rome and with St. Peter's Basilica reachable within 2 km, Anastasio Vatican Rooms features a shared lounge, non-smoking rooms, free WiFi throughout the property and a terrace. The property is set 1.7 km from Vatican Museums, 2.6 km from Ottaviano Metro Station and 3.2 km from Castel Sant'Angelo. The guest house has family rooms. All rooms are fitted with air conditioning, a fridge, a dishwasher, a coffee machine, a bidet, free toiletries and a desk. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower and a hairdryer, while some rooms at the guest house also feature a balcony. At Anastasio Vatican Rooms the rooms include bed linen and towels. Lepanto Metro Station is 3.3 km from the accommodation, while Battistini Metro Station is 3.5 km from the property. The nearest airport is Fiumicino, 25 km from Anastasio Vatican Rooms, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Generator Rome
description: Generator Rome is set a 10-minute walk from Termini Central Station and even closer to the Vittorio Emanuele Metro stop. This hostel set over 7 floors of a 19th-century building and provides free WiFi, a 24-hour reception, a café and a bar. The Generator Rome is great for visiting Rome as you will have plenty of bus and Metro links. This hostel offers rooms with a private bathroom and dormitory rooms with an internal shared bathroom. The Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore is around the corner and you can walk to the Coliseum from here.

name: Relais Trevi 95 Boutique Hotel
description: Set in the historical centre of Rome, Relais Trevi 95 Boutique Hotel is a design hotel just 150 metres from the Trevi Fountain. It offers air-conditioned rooms with a 32-inch LCD TV and free WiFi. The Trevi 95 is just opposite the Quirinale presidential palace and an 8-minute walk from the Pantheon. The hotel is a 5-minute walk to Barberini Metro Station for direct trains to the Vatican City and Termini Train Station. Rooms have elegant furnishings and parquet floors. Each includes air conditioning, a minibar, international channels and a private bathroom with a hairdryer and toiletries. An American buffet breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room or on the terrace. Guests can also enjoy a cocktail on the rooftop terrace. The front desk is open 24 hours a day and staff can give tourist advice and arrange airport transfers.

name: La Riviere Guesthouse Trastevere
description: No description found

name: Hotel Dorica
description: Located opposite the impressive Viminale Palace and near Rome's Opera Theatre, Hotel Dorica offers bright, air-conditioned rooms with private bathroom and satellite TV. Free WiFi is available in public areas. The family-run Dorica Hotel is a short walk from the Monti area, the Coliseum and the Roman Forum. Rome Termini is also nearby.

name: Aurelio Deluxe Rooms
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including a full-sized refrigerator/freezer and a stovetop, as well as free WiFi and a flat-screen TV. Other amenities include towels, an electric kettle, kitchenware and utensils, and a griddle.Expedia

name: Hotel Verona Rome
address: Via Di Santa Maria Maggiore 154, 00185 Rome
description: Hotel Verona Rome is located a few steps from the Basilica of Santa Maria Maggiore. You can walk to both Roma Termini Train Station and the Coliseum. Rooms are elegant and air-conditioned. Each room features a private bathroom with shower and hairdryer, tiled floors, and classic furniture. The Verona Rome is a family-run hotel. Staff are available around the clock to assist you with renting vehicles, booking guided tours, and any need you might have.

name: Magicsuite Guest House Roma Vaticano
address: Via della Madonna del Riposo 32, 00165 Rome
description: No description found

name: Triviho Hotel
description: Well set in Rome, Triviho Hotel provides a continental breakfast and free WiFi throughout the property. This 3-star hotel offers room service and a concierge service. Guests can have a drink at the bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Triviho Hotel offers certain rooms with city views, and every room is equipped with a kettle. All units include a wardrobe. Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Repubblica - Teatro dell'Opera Metro Station, Piazza Barberini and Barberini Metro Station. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 15 km from Triviho Hotel.

name: Hotel Savoy
description: Set in a renovated historical building, the Savoy offers a rooftop bar with panoramic views across the Eternal City and free WiFi throughout. Spagna Metro Station is 400 metres away. This private residence was converted into a hotel in 1920 and preserves its original style. You are greeted by the courteous and professional staff in the spacious lobby, complete with glass chandeliers and marble floors. All air conditioned, the elegant en suite rooms come with a satellite LCD TV, and a minibar. Some rooms offer extra space and luxury toiletries. An extensive sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is available daily. The à la carte restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine made with fresh, seasonal ingredients. A wide selection of fine Italian wines is also available. Piazza Barberini square is 450 metres from the property, while the Trevi Fountain can be reached on foot in 15 minutes.

name: Hotel Nazionale
description: Set next to Italian Parliament in the famous pedestrian square of Piazza Montecitorio, Hotel Nazionale offers elegant rooms with a flat-screen TV, and free WiFi throughout. The Pantheon is 350 metres away. All rooms here include air conditioning and a minibar. The private bathroom has free toiletries and a hairdryer. A sweet and savoury breakfast buffet is prepared daily including cheese, cold cuts, pastries and fresh fruit. Gluten-free options are available on request. Hotel Nazionale is set in a renovated building of the 18th century, within walking distance of the Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps. The imposing Pantheon is just around the corner. Piazza Navona and the Trevi Fountain are both within 500 metres of the property. The Spanish Steps are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Fair Suite Roma Termini
description: Ideally situated in Rome, Fair Suite Roma Termini features air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi and private parking. The property is around 1.5 km from Sapienza University of Rome, 1.6 km from Cavour Metro Station and 1.3 km from Quirinal Hill. The property is non-smoking and is situated 500 metres from Rome Termini Metro Station. All rooms in the guest house are fitted with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Popular points of interest near Fair Suite Roma Termini include Rome Termini Train Station, Repubblica - Teatro dell'Opera Metro Station and Santa Maria Maggiore. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 15 km from the accommodation.

name: Hassler Roma
description: Set at the top of the Spanish Steps, Hassler Roma is one of the city's most famous hotels. It offers elegant rooms and suites with high-speed free WiFi, and free wellness facilities including a sauna, Turkish bath and gym. Its restaurant and gym have panoramic views over Rome's rooftops. Dining options at the Hassler include the Michelin-starred Imàgo on the 6th floor, the stylish Salone Eva, and the Palm Court restaurant with its ancient stone walls. The cuisine is classic Italian, with international specialities. Rooms at the Hassler feature a satellite TV and air conditioning. All units are classically furnished and some have a large seating area with a sofa. The Hassler is a 5-minute walk from Spagna Metro, while chic Via dei Condotti is just 170 metres away. The hotel's free electric shuttle takes guests to shops in the surrounding area.

name: River Chateau Hotel
description: Just 300 metres from the banks of the Tiber River, the 4-star River Chateau Hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Ponte Milvio bridge. It offers a free gym and elegant rooms decorated with precious fabrics, marble, and mosaics. These air-conditioned rooms feature a minibar, free wired internet, and a flat-screen TV with satellite and pay-per-view channels. Each has a private bathroom with a hairdryer, bathrobes, slippers and free toiletries. A sweet and savoury buffet-style breakfast is served daily in the dining hall. The River Chateau is complete with a bar. Just 1.5 km from the Olympic Stadium, this hotel is a 5-minute drive from the Auditorium Parco della Musica. Saint Peter’s Square is 5 km away.

name: La Maison Royale
description: Situated in Rome, 1.8 km from the centre and less than 1 km from Castel Sant'Angelo, La Maison Royale features accommodation with amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TV. There is a private bathroom with bidet in all units, along with a hair dryer and free toiletries. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the bed and breakfast. Popular points of interest near La Maison Royale include St Peter's Square, The Vatican and Lepanto Metro Station. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 18 km from the accommodation.

name: Pietra
description: No description found

name: Bettoja Hotel Massimo d'Azeglio
description: Since the end of the 19th century, the 4 star Massimo DAzeglio has welcomed guests in a classic setting and has preserved the original Fin de Sicle ambience and style.This handsome heritage building has hosted many illustrious historical figures: the King of Serbia, the WW 1 air force hero Francesco Baracca, Benito Mussolini, General Diaz, Louis Armstrong, Pier Paolo Pasolini, Fausto Coppi, the composer Mascagni. The hotel contains an important collection of original paintings.iHotelier/iStay

name: Piccolotel
description: Piccolotel features air-conditioned guest accommodation in Rome, 500 metres from Roma Trastevere Train Station, 2 km from Basilica San Paolo Metro Station and 3.4 km from Roman Forum. Complimentary WiFi is availablethroughout the property. The units come with tiled floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a microwave, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with bidet and a hair dryer. A toaster, a fridge and kitchenware are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. An Italian breakfast is available every morning at the bed and breakfast. Guests can also relax in the shared lounge area. Campo de' Fiori is 3.5 km from Piccolotel, while Piazza di Santa Maria in Trastevere is 4 km away. The nearest airport is Fiumicino, 21 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Residenza Frattina
description: No description found

name: Hotel Castellino Roma
description: Set just next to Piazza Venezia, in the very centre of Rome, great value Hotel Castellino Roma offers the perfect location for exploring all the city’s sights. The hotel features free WiFi throughout and modern-style rooms. Each room at the Piazza Venezia hotel is decorated with works of modern art, and includes a satellite flat-screen TV, air conditioning and a private bathroom with hairdryer, slippers and toiletries. Some rooms have views of Piazza Venezia square, while suites have a spa bath. An American buffet-style breakfast is provided daily in the dedicated breakfast room. With the Roman Forum on one side, just a 5-minute walk away and the Trevi Fountain on the other, you couldn’t be better placed. Fashion and shopping streets are just a few steps away and of course, right opposite the hotel you have the huge Vittorio Emanuele II monument.

name: In Trastevere House
description: No description found

name: Hotel Osimar
description: Located 15 minutes’ walk from Rome’s Tibutina train station and Bologna Metro stop, Hotel Osimar is beautifully modern and offers great transport links into the historic centre. Featuring bright, fresh décor, Hotel Osimar’s interiors are comfortable and elegant. Rooms are well-maintained and come with air conditioning and minibars. Make use of the free internet point in the hall or enjoy a drink outside on the terrace. Buses will take you from nearby Hotel Osimar directly to the Trevi Fountain and the Spanish Steps, making tourism easy.

name: Casa I Cappuccini
description: No description found

name: Hotel Caravaggio
description: Hotel Caravaggio is a nice hotel in the heart of Rome, within walking distance of the beautiful Trevi Fountain, Colosseum and Termini station. The Repubblica Metro Station (line A) is nearby. Hotel Caravaggio welcomes guests in clean, roman-style rooms. There is paid airport shuttle service

name: Leon's Place Hotel
description: Featuring a free spa, Leon's Place Hotel In Rome is one of the most exclusive design hotels in Italy's capital city, located a 10-minute walk from Villa Borghese park and the famous Via Veneto. Spacious, air-conditioned rooms offer luxury furnishings and a marble bathroom. Many rooms have a beautiful view of the historic centre. A varied breakfast is served daily. Set in a historic building, Leon’s Place is in Rome’s business district, close to the main embassies and government buildings. Public buses are available in nearby Porta Pia, and provide links to Termini Train Station in about 10 minutes. The hotel features a free fitness centre and the Visionnaire Cafè, where you can enjoy drinks in a glamorous setting.

name: Palazzo Nainer
description: Set in one of the exclusive streets which lead from Piazza del Popolo to the Spanish Steps, Palazzo Nainer is an elegant boutique hotel providing excellent service and beautiful interiors. Built in the early 19th century, Palazzo Nainer is now surrounded by antique shops, art galleries and designer stores. A short walk will take you to Villa Borghese Park and two of Rome's most famous churches are just around the corner. Palazzo Nainer has a lovely rooftop garden. Sit out here and bask in the sun for a while or just enjoy the views over Rome's historic centre. Many of the hotel's comfortable and well-equipped rooms also come with their own balconies and charming views. Palazzo Nainer is perfect for staying in shape after enjoying Rome's culinary offerings. There is also an American bar here where you can enjoy an aperitif.

name: Hotel Museum
description: This family-run hotel is located opposite the Vatican Museums and the entrance to the Sistine Chapel. The sun terrace offers views of St. Peter’s Basilica. Each guest room at Hotel Museum features air conditioning, a TV with satellite channels, and free WiFi access. The décor is classic, with wallpaper and wooden furniture. When booking a room with a breakfast included option a generous buffet breakfast is available daily. During pleasant weather it is served on the terrace. The hotel is near many restaurants and bars. Cipro Metro Station is just 300 metres away. Guests have discounted rates at a nearby private garage parking.

name: Hotel Villa delle Rose
description: Offering a 200 m² garden and free WiFi throughout, Villa delle Rose is a historic home which is now a family-run hotel. This hotel is less than 5 minutes' walk from Rome's Termini Train Station. Rooms have a classic design with carpeted floors and traditional furniture. Each one features a flat-screen satellite TV. Drinks are available from the bar and can be enjoyed out in the garden. A continental, buffet-style breakfast is available. Breakfast can be brought to your room on request. Its location close to Termini means Villa delle Rose has excellent bus, metro and train links around Rome. You also have connections to both Ciampino and Fiumicino Airports.

name: Hotel Diocleziano
description: Offering a free gym with sauna, Hotel Diocleziano is opposite Termini Train Station and next to the Terme di Diocleziano ancient Roman baths. Its elegant rooms feature a free Wi-Fi and a paid mini bar. Rooms here have a classic design with carpeted floors. Each one is air conditioned and includes tea and coffee-making. You will also have a digital safe and an LCD TV with satellite channels. Snacks are not available at the bar. The Diocleziano Hotel is set in a 19th-century building in the heart of Rome. Staff can offer tourist information, book museum tickets and arrange massages. There is also a free internet point. A varied hot and cold buffet is served for breakfast and includes fresh fruit, cold cuts, and cakes. Snacks and drinks are available from the bar, which is open until 23:30. Being so close to Termini means you have excellent transport links around Rome and to both international airports. The Coliseum and Trevi Fountain are 2 metro stops away.

name: Eitch Borromini Palazzo Pamphilj
address: Via di Santa Maria dell Anima, 30, 00186 Rome
description: Boasting a panoramic terrace with views of Piazza Navona, St. Peter's Basilica and the Pantheon, Eitch Borromini Palazzo Pamphilj is set in a historical building from the 17th-Century, designed by Francesco Borromini. It offers spacious accommodation with free WiFi. The rooms and suites are elegantly decorated and feature modern details as well as original features of the building. They come with original frescoes, air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. The en suite bathroom includes Etro toiletries. Guests can start their day with a rich continental breakfast including jams, fresh fruits, cold cuts and pastries. Italian flavours and seafood dishes are also served at the à la carte restaurant. Eitch Borromini Palazzo Pamphilj is centrally located. The Pantheon, Campo de' Fiori and Castel Sant'Angelo can be reached in a 10-minute walk.

name: Sotel Nomentana
description: Idea Hotel offers functional rooms with large beds, and a generous breakfast of homemade pastries. Located in a residential area, it is a 30-minute journey from the centre of Rome. WiFi is free throughout. Sotel Nomentana is situated between Via Nomentana and Via Tiburtina. Public buses stop nearby and run to/from Ponte Mammolo Metro Station, on line B. Rooms have air conditioning and a private bathroom. Each features classic furnishings and modern-art paintings. At Roma Nomentana Idea Hotel drinks are available at the 24-hour bar and on the veranda. The restaurant serves classic Italian cuisine and Roman specialities. The hotel features a private garage and is in front of a free outdoor public parking.

name: Hotel Orazia
description: Set only 20 metres from Vittorio Emanuele Metro Station, Hotel Orazia is set on the top floor of an early 20th-century building in Rome's Piazza Vittorio Emanuele square. It offers free WiFi, air-conditioned rooms, and is a 10-minute walk from the Coliseum. Each with a satellite flat-screen TV, rooms here come with marble floors, a minibar and a private bathroom. Some rooms overlook the gardens at the centre of the square. A sweet and savoury buffet breakfast is available daily, including yoghurt, freshly baked croissants, cold cuts and cheese. The property is just 1 metro stop from Rome Termini Station, while Santa Maria Maggiore Basilica is 500 metres away.

name: Cavour Urban Rooms
description: While you're here, you can enjoy all the comforts of home and more, including free WiFi and a flat-screen TV, as well as air conditioning and daily housekeeping. Other amenities include towels, tour/ticket assistance, luggage storage, and guidebooks and/or recommendations.Expedia

name: Etruria Relais And Wine
description: No description found

name: Hotel Nautilus
description: Set on the second floor of a historic building in Rome's popular Prati district, Nautilus is on a quiet street 5 minutes' walk from both Lepanto and Ottaviano metro stations. Saint Peter's Basilica and the Vatican Museums are just 10 minutes' walk away. The neighbourhood is full of some of Rome's most popular shops, wine bars and restaurants. Rooms at Hotel Nautilus are all individually designed and have different amenities. They all come with either a fan or air conditioning and have a bathroom with shower. Some have a minibar, safe or LCD TV. Nautilus Hotel has a TV lounge and a breakfast room, although breakfast can be served to your room on request.

name: Z-Archsuites
description: No description found

name: Hotel Corona
description: A short walk away from Repubblica Metro Station and Termini Railway Station, this simple 3-star hotel offers a free breakfast, helpful multilingual staff and a central location in Rome. Just around the corner from Rome's Opera House, Hotel Corona is set in an old building on a quiet side street. A small market is close by and you will be within walking distance of main monuments. This no-frills hotel provides an on-site restaurant, an air-conditioned breakfast room, and small lounges. Wi-Fi access is available in the lobby at an additional cost. Hotel Corona has small clean rooms with en suite bathrooms, direct-dial telephones, a safe, a hairdryer, and satellite TV. Friendly staff can arrange city tours and book museum tickets. Ask about scooter, bicycle and car rentals. Air conditioning is centralised and controlled by the front desk.

name: Condotti Boutique Hotel
description: Hotel Condotti is a small and cosy boutique hotel, located on a peaceful, typical street of Rome's historic centre. It is just around the corner from the famous Spanish Steps. Spagna Metro Station, line A, is only 20 metres away and offers quick connection to places like the Vatican, Trevi Fountain, and Termini Central Station. Steps away from the hotel you can find Via Condotti, one of the most elegant streets in the world and home to fashionable boutiques. Featuring free WiFi throughout, Hotel Condotti offers a classic and elegant environment. The rooms and common areas were furnished with extreme care, the cosy lobby is adorned with marble floors, antiques, tapestries and a Venetian-glass chandelier. Some rooms are located in a separate building next door. A continental buffet breakfast is served daily in the breakfast room on the ground floor. The hotel can arrange a pick-up service from the airport. The service must be booked in advance.

name: Residenza Paolo VI
description: Offering panoramic views of Saint Peter's Square from its rooftop terrace, Residenza Paolo VI is a converted monastery with free WiFi. Just metres from Saint Peter's, the property is 15 minutes' walk from the Vatican Museums. Classically furnished and all air conditioned, rooms here have an LCD TV with satellite channels, tiled or wooden floors, and elegant rugs. The private bathroom comes with a hairdryer. Breakfast at Paolo VI is an extensive sweet and savoury buffet including scrambled eggs, cheese, cereal and yoghurt. Drinks and snacks can be enjoyed up on the terrace, with great views of the Apostolic Palace. The Residenza is 700 metres from both Castel Sant'Angelo castle and the river Tiber. It has excellent bus and metro links around Rome, with the 40 Express bus stopping nearby.

name: Navona Style
description: Ideally situated in Rome, Navona Style features a continental breakfast and free WiFithroughout the property. Boasting a lift, this property also provides guests with a terrace. The property is allergy-free and is situated 400 metres from Palazzo Venezia. The guest house will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a bidet. Navona Style provides some rooms with inner courtyard views, and rooms are fitted with a kettle. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. Popular points of interest near Navona Style include Piazza Venezia, Synagogue of Rome and Roman Forum. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino, 15 km from the guest house, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Colonna Suite del Corso
description: No description found

name: Boutique Hotel Campo de' Fiori
description: Boutique Hotel Campo de' Fiori is located in a corner of one of the city's most popular squares, and features a roof garden with views of the historic centre. This hotel designed by Dario DeBlasi offers rooms and self-catering apartments with free Wi-Fi, The unique rooms at Campo De' Fiori Hotel offer individually controlled air conditioning, soundproofing. and a satellite LCD TV. Apartments are located in different historic buildings around the square and also feature a fully equipped kitchen. The hotel's terrace has wicker furniture and a 360° view of Rome. During the day the square features a traditional fruit and vegetable market, and it is buzzing with bars and restaurants at night.

name: B&B Casa Vicenza
description: No description found

name: Casa San Giuseppe
description: Set in Rome, within 1.2 km of Ponte Lungo Metro Station and 1.9 km of Porta Maggiore, Casa San Giuseppe provides free WiFi throughout the property. The property is around 2 km from Domus Aurea, 2.9 km from Vittorio Emanuele Metro Station and 2.9 km from Coliseum. The property is non-smoking and is located less than 1 km from San Giovanni Metro Station. The units in the hotel are equipped with a TV. Featuring a private bathroom with a bidet and free toiletries, rooms at Casa San Giuseppe also offer a city view. Guest rooms at the accommodation include air conditioning and a desk. Casa San Giuseppe offers a continental or Italian breakfast. Palatine Hill is 3.1 km from the hotel, while Santa Maria Maggiore is 3.1 km away. The nearest airport is Rome Ciampino Airport, 12 km from Casa San Giuseppe.

name: Grand Hotel Palace
description: Located on Rome's Via Veneto opposite the American Embassy, this luxury hotel dates back to the 1920s. With free WiFi throughout, this property offers rooms with designer furnishings, an à la carte restaurant, and a free spa. Villa Borghese is 400 metres away. All air conditioned, rooms at the Grand Hotel Palace include an LCD satellite TV and a minibar. The marble bathroom includes VIP toiletries. Guests can enjoy fine Italian cuisine at the Cadorin Restaurant. Breakfast is an extensive American buffet with sweet and savoury options. After a day out, guests can unwind at the wellness centre which includes a sauna and a hot tub. Massages can be reserved, and a fitness centre is also available. The building, designed by Marcello Piacentini, was stylishly restored by Italo Rota. The Cadorin grand hall, and the ultra-modern business lounge with bar, are ideal for relaxation. The hotel is 5 minutes' walk from Piazza Barberini and Barberini Metro Station, on line A. The Spanish Steps are a 10-minute walk away.

name: Vittoriano Suite
description: No description found

name: Shali Luxury Suite Spagna
description: No description found

name: Kolbe Hotel Rome
description: Overlooking the Palatine Hill, Kolbe Hotel Rome combines medieval arches, exposed brickwork and a courtyard restaurant. It has an enviable location in the heart of historic Rome. Medieval interiors mix with contemporary furnishings such as the leather couches and plasma-screen TVs in the hotel lobby. Some rooms have exposed brick walls and high arched ceilings from the 15th century. The also include air conditioning, satellite TV and Wi-Fi access. A varied hot and cold buffet is available at breakfast. The Unique Al Palatino Garden Restaurant serves Roman and Italian dishes, which can be enjoyed on the patio overlooking the garden. Located next to a Franciscan friary, Kolbe Hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Coliseum and the popular area of Trastevere, just across the Tiber River. The hotel is very well connected by both tourist and local buses.

name: Hotel Sisto V
description: Hotel Sisto V is opposite Gemelli Train Station, a 5-minute walk from the Policlinico Gemelli hospital, and within easy reach of the Olimpico Stadium and the Vatican City. All rooms at the Sisto V Hotel offer air conditioning and satellite TV. Each room has a private bathroom with hairdryer, free Wi-Fi, and most also have a balcony. The Sisto V serves a varied buffet breakfast including pastries, jams, bread, cheese and ham. The spacious breakfast room is decorated with pictures and prints of typical Roman views.

name: Bettoja Hotel Mediterraneo
description: Designed by Art Deco Architect Mario Loreti in 1938, it sits on top of Esquilino Hill, the highest of Romes Seven Hills, offering unparalleled views of Rome. Inspired by the name Mediterraneo, the marine theme can be enjoyed throughout its 50 meters high 10 floors and 242 rooms. With its central location, a few steps from Roma Termini train station, guests staying at Hotel Mediterraneo can walk to all of the most iconic monuments and attractions of the Ethernal City.iHotelier/iStay

name: La Griffe Hotel Roma
description: La Griffe Roma MGallery Collection is in the heart of Rome, within a 5-minute walk of Piazza della Repubblica and Teatro dell'Opera di Roma. Featured amenities include a business center, limo/town car service, and express check-in. Event facilities at this hotel consist of a conference center and a meeting room. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours).Hotels.com

name: Hotel La Giocca
description: Located along Via Salaria just off Exit 8 of Rome's GRA orbital motorway, La Giocca is a modern hotel composed of 2 separate buildings, and offers free parking, a free outdoor pool, and a lush garden. Free WiFi is available throughout. Fitted with parquet floors, rooms here feature individually controlled air conditioning, an interactive satellite LCD TV and a minibar. The private bathroom has a bath or a shower. Hotel La Giocca features a reading room and bar. A buffet-style breakfast is served in the main building between 07:00 and 10:00. Guests can relax by the pool which is equipped with sun loungers and parasols. The adjacent Pappa Reale Restaurant serves high-quality cuisine with beef and fish specialities for lunch and dinner. Guests can enjoy outdoor dining in fine weather.

name: Hotel Pace Helvezia
description: Set in a sober and elegant building, Pace Elvetia is located at the very heart of Rome. From the hotel you can walk down to Piazza Venezia or up towards the Quirinale Hill. The Coliseum is a 15-minute walk away. Hotel Pace Elvetia features a panoramic rooftop terrace overlooking Vittorio Emanuele’s Monument and the ancient Mercati di Traiano. A continental buffet breakfast is served daily and includes cheese, ham, eggs, as well as pastries, fruit and hot drinks. Spacious rooms are fitted with classic furnishings, soft carpets and tapestries. Air conditioning and TVs are also provided. Free WiFi is available throughout the hotel. Many bus lines stop at the Elvetia’s door step with services to Termini Train Station, the Vatican and the lively Trastevere District, packed with bars and cafes.

name: Hotel Ristorante Villa Icidia
description: Set in its spacious garden, Villa Icidia is housed in a refurbished 16th-century ancient Roman villa. It is 4 km from Frascati and it offers a gourmet restaurant and large rooms with a private bathroom. The rooms are provided with air conditioning and classic décor. Each is equipped with an LCD TV with satellite channels, and a bathroom with shower. A buffet-style breakfast is served daily in the dining room, and it includes a selection of sweet products. The restaurant serves Mediterranean cuisine. Ciampino Airport is 10 km from the property. Cinecittà Metro Station is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Cassia
